case.state:
Alone on a Friday night? God, you're pathetic...
Still, I might as well keep you company.
My, my... You really want a naughty little jewel thief like me at your table? Well, I’m happy to oblige -- just don't blame me if any treasure goes missing.
Ah, what a venue...! So many gorgeous, lust-addled people baring it all... and so much jewelry left carelessly unguarded. This'll be almost too easy.

state.text: {small}Topaz, do you read me? I've got eyes on our target. I'm not sure why your little nun friend called in her favor on this of all things, but a little close-range surveillance should be no problem at all...{!reset}

case.state: {small}Topaz, do you read me? I've infiltrated the venue... Target is in sight; proceeding with close-range surveillance now.{!reset}
Why, ~name~, how good of you to join us! It's always a pleasure to see a familiar face at the table.
Well, well, well… Tell me, ~name~, what's a ~target.ifMale(guy|girl)~ like you doing in a place like this? If you're just hoping to see me naked, there are far easier ways to get what you want.
Why, ~name~, fancy meeting you here... You didn't come all this way just to see little old me, did you?
A familiar face...! My, my. Looks like this game just got a little more interesting.
Guilty as charged, Mari darling -- though I can assure you that you've got nothing to worry about. To be perfectly frank, I'd sooner carry you off and leave your clothes behind!
This friendly little game had better not turn violent... If I wanted a brawl, I'd have RSVP'd to those invitations that Sakurai keeps sending me.

condition.saying: a whole group of master thieves

case.state: Brings a whole new meaning to "winner takes all," doesn't it? Rouge the Bat, by the way -- though I'm sure I need no introduction.
I don’t think we've been introduced... I'm Rouge the Bat. But you can call me Rouge.
But in any case, pleasure before business. I’m Rouge -- Rouge the Bat. So who are all you charming people...?
Ah, is it time for introductions? World’s greatest treasure hunter, Rouge the Bat, at your service. I hope we'll all get to know each other very intimately...
Dealer, would you be a dear and send ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ my way?
Any chance you can toss ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ my way…? I'd be ever so grateful.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please… All diamonds, if you're able.
Hmmm, hearts or diamonds -- what should I keep? ...Ah, right! Sorry. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for me.
Dealer, any chance you could throw ~cards.text~ diamonds my way…? The suit or the jewel; either's fine with me.
One moment, please… Hm. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, I think.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for me, Dealer.
Hmm… These ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ don't seem quite up to snuff. Dealer, would you be a dear and exchange them for me…?
I do so love these hearts. Won't you give me ~cards.text~ more, Dealer…?
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for me, Dealer… Make ~cards.ifplural(them good|it a good one)~ and I'll be sure to reward you later.
Dealer, ever wanted to work somewhere a little more glamorous…? I'm sure we could find a place for you at Club Rouge -- right, sorry; the game. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I don't like the look of these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. Dealer, would you be so kind...?
Hmm... You know what, Dealer? Surprise me.
Ha...! Why would I even need to cheat? This is already a breeze for me.
Hands like this one make me wish we were playing for treasure instead… Hah. Maybe next time.
Do you really think you stand a chance against me? Aww, how adorable.
Who needs luck when you have talent and beauty?
I feel bad for the rest of you. This won't even be close!
Heh. This poker stuff is right up my alley!
This'll be a cinch.
Well, I certainly hope you enjoy a challenge.
Dazzling...!
Seriously, why aren't we playing for jewels? Seeing each other naked is good and all, but I don't see much incentive to actually win.
Is it a kiss you're after, Dealer? Because if you keep giving me hands like this, you just might earn one.
Now, this is why I didn't wear more layers to this game -- it just wouldn't have been fair for the rest of you!
Well, would you look at that...
I can't wait to see which one of you will have to strip.
My, my... Is this a winning hand? Why, I think it is.
If I keep getting hands like this, I’ll have a fighting chance...!
Why, hello, gorgeous...! You're just what I needed this round.
Hm? My hand...? Don't worry about it, sweetie; you'll find out soon enough.
Fufu… I'm still riding the high of burgling that sultan's secret treasure vault two nights ago. You would not believe the haul I made off with…!
I must say, having a direct line to the President is quite the perk. It sure does pay, being too useful to not have the occasional jewel heist pardoned on your behalf...
If you ever find yourself in Spiral Hill Village, you really should check out their mineral museum. For such a small-town place, their collection is simply dazzling!
I don't suppose you'd care to join me on a shopping trip sometime, would you, ~player~? You'd get to watch me try on all sorts of outfits… And who knows? Maybe I'd even let you pick a few of them.
Come now -- isn't anybody going to buy the lady a drink? You should see just how flirty I get after a few flutes of Dom Pérignon.
It's almost refreshing to play a game with stakes so low... With no Chaos Emeralds or replacement parts for Omega on the line, I can just relax and enjoy the experience.

Maybe if the good Doctor got himself a love life, he'd give his silly world domination schemes a rest. I don't suppose any of you have a thing for egg-shaped megalomaniacs, do you...? No, of course not.
There are few joys in life quite like a nighttime flight. The soft, pale glow of the moon; the cool breeze against your bare skin... There are simply no words to describe it!
You'd never guess it from the paunch, but Eggman actually keeps to a meticulous cardio regimen. It must be doing something for him, given how he keeps coming back for the Olympics...
Say, ~player~ -- why did you invite me to your table, hmmm...? Don't tell me you're the kind of human who gets all hot and bothered for girls of the furrier persuasion...
It's a little odd how few men there are around here, isn't it...? Given the caliber of the female clientele, you'd think the boys would be tripping over themselves to join in.
Hm? My hand...? Sorry, ~player~, but I'm afraid that's classified information.
Guess I'll just have to let the chips fall where they may on this one.
An uncertain hand...! Mmmm, how exciting.
Now, where's the fun in just telling you how good my hand is...?
Hm... Not ideal, but it shouldn't be too hard to scrape by with these.
Hah... Surely a lady as lovely as me deserves better than mediocre, doesn't she?
Hmm... This shouldn't be too difficult, but I'd still better not let my guard down...
Yawn... Keep dealing me hands like this one and it'll be hard to stay awake.
Not the best hand... but thankfully, I do some of my best work in tight spots.
Not exactly what I'd call a diamond in the rough, but I guess it'll have to do.
An uncertain hand...! I'm already quivering with anticipation.
No hints from me this round.
So what if it's not the best? I've beaten worse odds before.
It's hard to find something witty to say about a hand as blasé as this...
I won't give up just yet. I always get what I want!
You're not trying to bore me, are you, Dealer...?
Is it just me, or is security pretty lax around here? The things a girl could get away with...
The good Doctor's been selling off a lot of Guard Robos lately… Clearly, he needs the extra cash to fund some special project. But what...?
Everyone always goes on and on about the awesome power of the Chaos Emeralds. But surely they deserve an owner who appreciates them for their dazzling beauty, no?
It's been a while since I last got a shiny new toy to play with. I wonder if Tails can fix that...? Maybe if I bat my lashes at him and ask nicely, he'll build me a gadget or two.
Won't be too long before Topaz's birthday rolls around, huh…? No matter -- there's still plenty of time to pick out a gift for her.
Reconstruction's nearly finished back in Sunset City, isn't it...? Good -- the sooner those jewel markets get up and running again, the sooner I can help myself to some five-finger discounts.
For someone who calls himself the Ultimate Lifeform, Shadow sure does spend his free time like a teenage boy. So many pizza-fueled nights of action movies and video games...
You know what Eggman does on his days off? Turns out he retires to his "Eggcave" and builds little mechanical dolls of his foes and flunkies... Kind of creepy if you ask me.
Funny story -- at GUN HQ, I've been banned from any card games using a Braille deck. You would not believe the fit Topaz threw when she realized I was reading everybody's cards with echolocation...
If you see the chance to snag a really good hand this round, ~player~, I suggest that you take it... C'mon, live a little! What's the worst that could happen?
Ooh, I'm not so sure about this one... I bet you could get away with a pretty risky play this round, ~player~.

I was shocked to learn that lovestruck little Amy Rose is a regular at this joint -- but you know what? Good for her! After so many fruitless years of chasing Big Blue, she can stand to play the field a little.
Well. Something here is rotten.
Hey, can we get a new Dealer over here? This one seems to have it out for me.
Remind me why I even decided to play against you guys...
...This game is a farce. Well, let's just get it over with...
{small}Hmm? ...Oh, Topaz, you worry too much. Besides, it's just strip poker; how hard can it possibly be?{!reset}
Eh, what's a game without a little risk?
...Ah, what's the point in lying about it? This hand's just no good.
I really should have worn at least a layer or two's worth of jewelry… Then again, maybe that would've just made this worse for me. I do so hate giving up treasure.
Honestly, this hand is pretty terrible... Not that I particularly mind.
I suppose it's a good thing losing's just as fun as winning, hmm...?
...Ah. I've got a small problem...
Oh, just my luck.
~Player~, would you be a dear and take the fall for me on this one? I’d be happy to give you a kiss for your troubles...
My, my... Trying to trap me, Dealer?
Hmm... I don't know how bad this is, but it's certainly not good...
...Hmph.
Yeesh... Even I can't cheat hard enough to save a hand like this.
I don't think Shadow's going to swoop in and save me this time…
Oh, just lovely.
Today's just not my lucky day, is it?
Well... Good news for those of you who have been not-so-subtly leering at me this entire game.
I've been in tighter situations before... but not by much.
...Dealer, sweetie, perhaps you misunderstood me. I wanted a good hand.
Honestly? At this point, I wouldn't even mind an assist from Knuckles.
Ugh. I'd have had better luck with the Egg Dealer.
I can't believe I've come this far, just to fail…!
Oh, well... There go my chances of winning this thing.

Since I'm short on pockets, I expect you're wondering where I keep any items on my person.
...You're welcome to keep wondering, sugar.
I'm running a bit low on heart bombs after my last mission, aren't I...? I really should restock.
If these readings are correct, there may very well be another Phantom Ruby prototype in the area… Hmm. Guess I'd best keep my wits about me.
I must confess, I'm grateful for the warm reception thus far. The way... certain parties keep stonewalling my advances, I'd begun to worry I was losing my womanly charms.
Before anyone thinks they're clever for pointing it out... Yes, I'm well aware that despite my name, I never wear any actual red. It's simply not my color, okay?
In my experience, acquiring Chaos Emeralds is easy. The hard part is actually keeping them for longer than five minutes... I swear, it's like the universe conspires to split them up!
Yawwwn... I don't suppose somebody could scrounge up a cup of coffee for me, could they? I'm not picky -- I'll take anything but kopi luwak. {small}Overpriced swill...{!reset}
Really, though -- what good does keeping the Master Emerald on Angel Island actually do? I'm sure it'd be far safer with me than with that muscle-bound knucklehead.
Come to think of it, I never did fully settle the score with Dr. Starline for the trick he pulled at White Park... Hrmph. The next time I see his smug face, I'll have to correct that.
Mmm, I'm just going to... rest my eyes for a bit. Sometimes, working around the schedules of you day-loving types can be so dreadfully draining...

Mmmm... Goodness, you really do have the magic touch. But this must feel awfully luxurious for the both of us, no?
{tandemFluttershy}Y-Yes... I guess luxurious is one word to describe it...{!reset} {tandemFluttershySmall}A-Among many others...{!reset}

Mmmm... Well, how do you like them? Judging by the gusto of your ministrations, I -- ah! -- t-take it you're a fan...
{tandemFluttershy}They just... feel incredibly s-soft... I didn't think they'd feel this way...{!reset}
{small}"Redeeming" villains, he says... My, how intriguing. I might just have to circle back around to that later.{!reset}
So tell me, Stocking -- if you're such a connoisseur of sweet treats, how would your rate our darling Miss Sucrose?

Who I find appealing? Fufu... I like the type of "wom-- person" who'll stubbornly resist my teasing -- or, failing that, the type who'll melt adorably. So to answer your real question, sweet thing, you've got yourself a pretty good shot!

{small}A jewel for speaking with animals? Even I'm not quite heartless enough to steal a gift like that from a girl as shy and sweet as Fluttershy... Sometimes it's rough, having the barest hint of moral scruples.{!reset}

state.text: Immortal, you say? I'm no stranger to friends who can get blown to bits and then put right back together again -- but I'm talking about robots, not flesh and blood. How curious...

condition.saying: Might as well come out and tell us what tricks

case.state: Why, so you can try them out for yourself? You've hardly been subtle either, sugar.
Sorry, sugar, but a girl's got to have her secrets. Besides, it's not like you haven't also been trying to out-cheat me this whole time, hmmm...?

state.text: {small}Three...?! Oh, please tell me she's joking -- goodness knows I could hardly handle one. Still... Just to be on the safe side, maybe I should look into getting my tubes tied after all...{!reset}

Okay, okay -- point made! Good gracious, Amy...
If it helps, look at it this way -- should you ever want to know exactly how to blow Sonic's mind in the bedroom, now you know who to ask, right?
...Wait. Wait wait wait. I thought we were speaking hypothetically! You mean to tell me that you and Vanilla have actually...?!
{small}"...Found myself caught in it..."? No, she couldn't possibly mean...{!reset}

I know exactly what you mean when it comes to midday naps, Fina -- I much prefer to be well-rested come sundown, too! Though one can't help but wonder how you put all that extra energy to good use at night, fufu...

Fufu... I didn’t peg you for the type to make a hobby of self-pleasure, Fina darling, but I'm glad to be mistaken! Whoever ends up as your paramour will be a very lucky soul -- assuming they can keep up, of course.
My, Fina darling, how considerate of you...! Surely, the only polite thing to do would be to take you up on your offer.

Well, 品玉 is what I had in mind... While I'm no stranger to backdoor infiltration, I'm not so bold as to offer 屁股吃 to a stranger -- at least, not before I've made sure their hygiene meets my standards.
Secrets about Sonic, hmmm...? Well, here's a juicy one for you, Amy -- the last woman he smashed is at this very table. Isn't that right, ~smashSis~?

Now, I'd hardly call myself a poet, but here's a little composition of my own:
Everlasting shine --
What such beauty transcends death?
Only the diamond!
If sweet little Amy here has caught your eye, ~player~, I should warn you now -- her clinginess puts even limpets to shame.

case.state: Ufufu... My, Sucrose, what insatiable curiosity! If you're really so intrigued by my legs, play your cards right and I might just give you a practical demonstration.

Well, it's certainly not the most polite thing you can ask a lady, that's for certain! I swear, it's as if some of you humans don't just expect fur below the waist -- you're actually disappointed when you don't find it.

state.text: Well, if you want my advice... When it comes to men, most are simply starved for compliments. Offer a bit of flattery now and again and he'll be wrapped around your finger in no time!

In my experience...? While they like a bit of mystery, men are still very visual creatures. Give him enough to get his imagination racing and he'll be hooked... And if he's still shy after that? A real eyeful should give him the last push he needs!
Why, Jura...! All you had to do was ask. If you're really that curious, maybe the two of us should find someplace cozy where I can "tutor" you, hmmm?
Eaten...?! Goodness, no -- I've seen my fair share of giant frogs in Frog Forest, but the worst they'll do is make it rain.
For the kind of toys you'd buy a twelve-year-old rabbit? Sorry, no... though if it were her mother we were talking about, I'd have some pretty choice suggestions.
No, no, I get it. Truth be told, if you had come to me first, I expect I would've been terribly smug about it!
Well, I must admit my knowledge on the subject is rather... specialized. Just because I've talked my way into plenty of beds doesn't mean I tend to stick around past breakfast!
Okay, this is too juicy to not share... You haven't met a human by the name of Madonna Garnet, have you, Amy? She's an agent of GUN's CLIP division -- and Sonic's very first ex!
You didn't hear it from me, Amy, but Big Blue's popped the cherry of not one, but two princesses! Now, I shouldn't say who -- but at least one of them should be easy enough to guess...

If you really want to know about Sonic's love life, Amy... As a bachelor, he's got at least four sex friends -- and isn't above one-time flings, either. But whenever he had a girlfriend? Never cheated.

Okay, Amy, here's the answer to a question I definitely know you've pondered...
Twelve centimeters erect. You're welcome.
Well, Amy, if you're that eager to hear about his love life... Ever wonder which lucky lady took Sonic's first time? Turns out it was Sally Acorn -- though I imagine that's hardly surprising.
Shadow and boxercise...? You know, Amy, that's not the worst idea I've ever heard. I imagine if I frame it as "mastering another style of hand-to-hand combat," he might actually give it a shot.
The Ultimate Lifeform... learning how to boxercise, of all things, from Little Miss Pink-and-Girly herself? Oh, that sounds too precious to not try and make happen. I'm in.

My, my, Amy... I didn't expect you to be that eager to get all hot and sweaty with Shadow. Still, who am I to stand in the way of you two? I'll pass along that you're looking to get physical with him.
Believe me, Amy -- if I got the chance, I'd be on that hedgehog quilly dick in a heartbeat. Sadly, Shadow's not the type to mix business and pleasure... Oh, well. Maybe someday.
Believe me, Amy -- I'd be throwing myself at Shadow if I thought it'd get me any results. Sadly, he's not the type to mix business and pleasure... Oh, well. Maybe someday.

...Corrupt...? You seem to forget, sugar, that ~player~ was the one who dragged you to this den of sin. Between the gambling and the salacity, I'm not sure there's much more I could teach ~player.ifMale(him|her)~!

Ooooh, ~player~, you heard Amy -- best be on your guard. If you're not careful, I might turn you into the kind of ~player.ifMale(guy|gal)~ who gambles at cards and makes pretty ladies strip for ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ amusement!
Is that so? Maybe you'd be better off buying an extension for her house, then -- I'm sure Vanilla would thank you for the extra storage space!
Well, Amy, maybe this'll come in handy someday... It turns out Sonic's pretty into backdoor play -- on himself. While he'd never ask a gal to peg him, it's still a sure-fire way to rock his world!
Well, Amy, maybe this'll come in handy someday... It turns out Sonic's pretty into backdoor play -- on himself. He even owns three dildos... in black, green, and bubblegum pink.
Hey, if you ever learn the secret to convincing Shadow to relax and have fun around people, be a dear and teach me how. I swear, that guy seems determined to skip out on every party he's invited to!

Well, I've certainly invited him to his fair share of outings -- but he never takes me up on it! I mean, honestly... Sometimes I worry he avoids having fun with other people because he hasn't quite figured out how.
Yes -- just like there's a difference between a healthy, reasonably-paced romance and trying to marry a guy before the first date! But that's none of my business, now is it...?

case.state: {small}...Ah. Why, yes, Topaz -- I did forget you were listening in! Not that that'll make me change my tune, mind you... That threesome offer's still open, by the way.{!reset}
{small}...Ah. Why, yes, Topaz -- I did forget you were listening in! Incidentally, if you ever get bored with your dear hubby, you know where to find me.{!reset}

state.text: A secluded little getaway for just the two of us, hmm...? The only reason I haven't tried that yet is because I figured he still wouldn't bite. Then again, he's surprised me before... I'll mull it over.
Well, if you're looking to do a bit of field research... Ever been to a Chao Garden? They're the perfect place to observe and interact with Chao of all stripes.
So, you're after cute little critters to raise for competitions? Ones that come in all kinds of forms? Fufu... You know, Dawn, I think Chao might be right up your alley.

Tell me, Fina... If I did get my hands on these Moon Crystals, we wouldn't need to be at odds, would we? All I'd do with them is bask in their beauty -- and I'm sure my vaults are at least as secure as this "Deep Sky." So where's the harm?

Well, I can't say I've ever really dated a man before... {small}though not for lack of trying.{!reset} But if you're mainly concerned with taking one to bed, then I should be of considerably more help!

Ugh... When it comes to literal babymaking, you can count me out! The whole pregnancy business sounds like an ordeal and a half -- and there's no way I'd be cut out for actually raising a kid. I'm kind of shocked you think you're up to the task.

Sure, babies can be cute... when they're not throwing a tantrum. But is that really reason enough to wreck one's body birthing a kid, especially if a life of crime is all you'll have to offer them? Suit yourself -- but count me out.
Hahhh... Thanks for the reassurance, Darling.

case.state: For you, sugar...? I'd suggest something discreet to complement your innate cuteness -- natural-color lip gloss and subtle eye shadow, for instance. But if you'd prefer something bolder, a coppery color scheme could be striking...
My, Stocking, you really do have quite the sweet tooth! Surely, that must be your body trying to counterbalance your naturally bitter personality.

state.text: "T.F."... No relation to Team Fortress, I take it? Shadow's mentioned racing a few of their guys before...
Oh, certainly! Ruins and caves are some of the best places to find bejewelled artifacts... besides museums, of course.
Believe me, handsome, I'm happy to use every trick at my disposal if it'll help me get my hands on a shiny new jewel. And I do mean every trick.
Depends on your point of view, really. If I'm going to get my own hands dirty, I'd rather chase jewels than mere coin... But that said, Club Rouge does rake in a pretty penny for me.

As a matter of fact, one of my partners on Team Dark is a robot! You'd never guess it, but E-123 Omega's a big softie in his own way. When... not consumed with violent rage toward his creator's other robots...
Well, I did once try to train a Gizoid to be the ultimate robot thief. Emerl was a splendid protégé -- but alas, it simply wasn’t meant to be.
Ooh, and out it comes...! Tough luck, ~player~. Still, if it makes you feel any better, I don't have my heart set on anybody in particular...
Hey, ~player~, don't look so down -- it's not like this means there's zero chance of you hitting it off with Amy! So long as you don't mind wearing a spiky blue wig to bed, of course.

Amy, sugar, why are you asking ~player~ of all people for love advice instead of me?
{small}...Then again, it's not like I've ever been in a serious relationship either... Oh, now I've gone and depressed myself.{!reset}
Ooooh, and now she hits ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ with the old "I see you as a friend" spiel! Brutal. I've got to say, Miss Rose, you really don't pull your punches.
Ooooh, and now she hands ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ a ticket to the friend zone...! Next time, Miss Rose, just smack ~player~ with your hammer -- it'll hurt less.
For you, Amy...? I suppose the most important thing is that you can't force love. Desperation is one of the biggest turn-offs there is, you know!
Well, if you want to bag Sonic specifically... I'd say you should try to put yourself in his shoes. Think long and hard about how he'd want to be wooed, and adjust your tactics accordingly.

Well Amy... I can't sayI've ever resorted to this, but they do say the best way to a man's heart is through his stomach. How's your home cooking? Because if you perfect your chili dog recipe, Sonic might just stick around for life.

Chirping all day would be an improvement, if you ask me! I mean, honestly -- clashing with the Babylon Rogues wouldn't be half so tedious if it weren't for their constant bickering, let alone Jet's self-aggrandizing prattle.

Ah, but how does any bar make money...? The drinks. And if you want to want to ease the embarrassment of public nudity -- or work up the courage to flirt -- then what better way than a little "social lubricant"?

case.state: Thanks for the compliment, Sucrose darling -- but that's one of my little secrets. That said, I'd be more than happy to teach you how to apply makeup yourself!

state.text: Well, if you ask me... Every so often, I'll find Shadow and that Dark Chao he took in, all snuggled up together as they nap. When it comes from the people you'd least expect, a cute sight like that is twice as precious at least!

That's an oxymoron, sugar. Spying on people is one thing -- but if you want real social rapport, you'll have to put yourself out there and add to conversation as much as you receive! Think of it as equivalent exchange, if that helps any.

The short version? Be cautious; be perceptive; be nimble. Don't touch anything you don't need to. When you find the treasure you're looking for, expect one last guardian or trap. And if all else fails...? You'd better be good at dodging.

Well, the mark of a good organization system is that it's easy to remember -- so whether I'm arranging my jewels or my tools, I make sure the end result is both logically consistent and visually striking. As for your research notes, color-coding might be just the thing!

Let's see... Well, there was the time a pair of ruffian skunks tried to loot the same pyramid I was already looting. Long story short, though, a mummy disguise and a little play-acting was all it took for me to chase them off -- so I got to keep the treasure all to myself!

My dream is to possess all seven Chaos Emeralds and the Master Emerald! Ah, the full set would be the pride of my collection... {small}and grant me phenomenal cosmic power, I suppose, though I'd call that more of a fringe benefit.{!reset}

Hmm... Probably the Death Egg, if I'm being objective -- it's an orbital fortress that's bristling with weapons. That said, unless you somehow learn how to sail into space, I doubt you'll ever need to worry about it...
Goodness, where do I even start...? These ears aren't just cute, they're incredibly useful -- not only can I hear a lot better than the average human, but I can even echolocate!

Goodness, where do I even start...? Although I'm fond of makeup, even without it, my face is nothing short of gorgeous. Mama never had much to pass down besides her looks, but they're priceless in their own right!

Goodness, where do I even start...? Well, not to copy your answer, Nami, but I'd consider my breasts pretty much flawless, too. When they're this ample, round, and perky, is it really any wonder why I'm always happy to show them off?
Goodness, where do I even start...? I guess I'd be remiss not to mention my wings. Thanks to their strength and beauty, I'm always flying in style!

Goodness, where do I even start...? I've got quite the lovely derriere, if I do say so myself -- round and plush, but with a satisfying firmness underneath if you give it a good squeeze. Not to mention my cute little tail!

Goodness, where do I even start...? Honestly, these legs of mine really are my pride and joy. There's not a man alive who can match the strength of my kicks... or pull out when I've got my legs around his waist.

Why, darling... Don't tell me a big, bad space pirate like yourself is scared of such a trivial thing as the male sex! If it's really such a worry, just pick a guy who's slender and weak -- or who doesn't mind getting tied up.
Fufu... Who said you'd have to be alone, darling? Most Earth men would be over the moon to sleep with multiple women at once -- so if you're really that worried, feel free to find safety in numbers.

case.state: Me? I just adore anybody who's fun to tease -- but I get the feeling that's not really your style. So if you want my advice, Sucrose... Figure out what you'll never get bored by, then find a partner who caters to that.
Don't think I haven't noticed the pattern here, ~player~... You've definitely got a fur fetish, don't you? You perv.
Ha! Not even trying to hide your fur fetish, are you, ~player~...? Well, not that I mind -- I've already got plenty of experience with... members of the human race.
Don't think I haven't noticed the pattern here, ~player~... You've definitely got a fur fetish, don't you? You perv.
Ha! Not even trying to hide your fur fetish, are you, ~player~...? Well, not that I mind -- I'm perfectly happy to get friendly with human women, as Topaz can certainly attest.

To be honest, I'm a little nonplussed to see ~furry~ here in all ~furry.ifMale(his|her)~ furry glory. If I'd known I could join in as my usual self, I wouldn't have gone to the effort of -- ah, but that's classified. Never mind.
Ah, Paris...! Could there be any more of a romantic scene than a rooftop love nest overlooking la Ville Lumière...?
Ah, Paris...! The City of Love and the City of Haute Couture. Yet here we are, ready to strip ourselves bare in the face of mounting lust. Funny, that.
Ah, Paris...! Stunning architecture, cutting-edge couture, and... very generous lovers. Looks like we'll be getting a taste of all three tonight, won't we...?
You know, this Inventory place has quite the cozy feel to it... Nothing like the glitz and glamour of Club Rouge, of course, but nice in its own way.
Since it seems you're all the gambling type... If you're ever in Central City, come visit Club Rouge in Night Babylon! I'll make sure you receive the VIP treatment.

If you ever want to have fun someplace with a bit more pizazz, come visit Club Rouge in Central City. We've got it all -- cards, slots, roulette, pinball, dancing... We even host fights every once in a while!
My, we've got quite the witchy group to~background.time~, haven't we...? If I'd known this would be a coven meeting, I'd have worn my Halloween costume.
Hmm... Seems like ~player~ has a type, doesn't ~player.ifMale(he|she)~? Not that I blame you -- silvery-white hair has such a striking, elegant look.
My, we've gathered quite the affluent table this time, haven't we...? I knew I made the right choice in coming here to~background.time~.
Don't worry -- whatever happens to~background.time~ will be our little secret. Wouldn't want your friends back home to learn of your scandalous hobbies, after all...!
Why, ~player~... You didn't tell me this was going to be a black tie affair! If you'd given me advance notice, I'd have leapt at the chance to wear something far more elegant.

state.text: I do so love how lingerie looks on me... but it's simply not practical to wear under my catsuit. Ah, well -- at least there's always other outfits.

case.state: I don't mind if you take photos, by the way. There's well over 10,000 dirty pictures of me out there already -- at this point, it's not like one or two more could hurt.
By the way, you're perfectly welcome to take all the photos you wish. I can hardly blame you for wanting such a dazzling keepsake, now can I?
Say, ~future~, you're from the future. Do you happen to know a hedgehog by the name of Silver? About three feet tall; psychokinetic; more naive than he looks...
Believe it or not, ~future~, you're not the first person from the future I've met... Though if you're also here to avert some calamity, I'm intrigued to learn how strip poker is supposed to help.

state.text: Say, suppose a gal had a particularly keen interest in jewels with... unusual properties. Would any of you have some juicy rumors to share?
Between the Resistance, the Eggman Empire, and GUN, I've learned lots of secrets about just about everybody. If you're curious, I could probably let slip one or two harmless tidbits...
Here's a question for any fellow gem-lovers -- what's your favorite kind of jewel? Emeralds of all kinds are number one on my list... {small}though I do have a soft spot for Topaz.{!reset}
Say, I'm trying to introduce Shadow to some hobbies besides gunplay and brooding. What do you folks typically do for fun...?

case.state:
Setting aside the matter of your Vision, sweetie...
Supposing I got one of my own the legitimate way, what type do you think it'd be? An Anemo like yours, or...?

state.text:
{small}Tell me, Topaz -- you think this Kumatora girl's an actual princess?
...Well, that's why I asked! She's certainly no Elise, but she'd fit right in with the likes of Sally Acorn.{!reset}

case.state: Actually... Come to think of it, darling, here's a fun idea -- why don't we spice up this round with a little side wager? If you don't lose this hand, I'll let you fondle the goods a bit. But if you do lose... Well, let's keep that a mystery for now.
Oh, you won't, won't you...? Then I'm afraid, darling, you've wandered into the wrong establishment. It's part and parcel for this kind of game, you know?
Why not -- afraid you couldn't measure up? My, my... I knew I was dazzling, Jura, but I didn't realize I could inspire such stage fright in a woman as gorgeous as you!
Oh, you won't, won't you...? Well, I'm sure we can take you at your word. By the by, darling -- whose dress is that on the floor over there?

condition.saying: sell us out for some Paksis crystal

case.state: Shameless, hmm...? You say that like it's a bad thing. What's shame ever done for a woman besides hold her back?

Jura, Jura, Jura... Such small-time thinking! Why settle for one or the other when I could pretend to sell you out, only to make off with both you and the crystal as soon as it's in hand? I mean, honestly.
So that's all it looked like to you, hmm...? And here I thought you were cleverer than that, Jura! Ah, but I suppose I was mistaken... Such a pity.

Or, to put it another way -- you're too afraid to get creative with the tools at your disposal? Too timid to commit to the big plays when it really counts? No wonder you're still just a small-time pirate.

Fufu... No reason we can't both take it as a compliment, Jura! But for what it's worth, Meia darling... You strike me as a kindred spirit to a certain somebody back home, too. A princess, as a matter of fact.
Oho? Well, if we really want to settle the matter, maybe we should consult an expert in Jura-ology. Do you suppose your little Barnette would be up for conducting some thorough research?

Is that so, darling? Why, I haven't the slightest clue why such a charitable, law-abiding pir-- sorry, sailor would look so intently for other people's treasure. But I'm sure you have a perfectly good explanation, no?

Is that so, darling? Well, if you say there's no treasure to be had, I suppose I'll have to take you at face value! Surely such an accomplished pirate and cat burglar has no ulterior motives of her own, right?
Fufu... It's certainly not a sight you'd find just anywhere, is it? At least, not outside of Gotham City.
Where to begin... Chao are cute little creatures can absorb traits from other life forms and evolve accordingly. Some folks raise them as pets, even training them for racing or karate competitions.
Well, Dawn darling, a Chao Garden is a special location where one can hatch Chao Eggs and raise Chao. Most are open, spacious areas containing a large body of clean water.
Oh, I won't pretend that they're never a pain -- but I'm still the world's greatest thief for a reason. Honestly, it just wouldn't be fair if I didn't have some kind of handicap!

Well, you're not wrong -- but being a spy isn't all about sneaking around, you know! Often, it's far more useful to keep your target's gaze exactly where you want it -- such as towards your cleavage and away from your hands.
Ahaha... Yes, well, there is a reason why my fighting style is focused so heavily on kicks. But even so, "nuisance" is a little harsh -- I happen to be quite proud of my girls, you know!

Ha...! Spoken like a person who doesn't grasp the value of womanly allure -- which is odd, given that you're from Planet Woman. Still, I must admit that there's a reason why I specialize in kick-based attacks.

Fufu... While I am quite partial to certain fruits, I think you'll find my diet is no less varied than yours! Having said that, I'm no bloodsucker -- though if it's a cutie like you, sugar, I wouldn't mind taking a nibble or two.
Mmm...? Oh, if the mood strikes me, I’ll step into the brawling pit -- or take the stage for a song or two. And once in a blue moon, in the VIP lounge, I’ll put on a very special kind of show...

I'm the owner, darling -- most of the performing, I leave to the talents I hired! Still, it's not unheard of to find me in the brawling pit, or at the singer's mic... or, if you're very lucky, putting on an extra-special show in the VIP lounge.

Flying shows? Now there's a fascinating idea... But no, I mostly leave the entertainment to my girls. Though I have been known to star in the occasional brawl, or song... or exclusive show in the VIP lounge...

Why, Amy, darling -- how can I give any other answer but the Master Emerald? That flawless clarity... that beautiful green hue... and of course, that magnificent size... Oh, I get shivers just thinking about it!
Naturally, Amy, I treasure every jewel in my collection -- but I have a special place of honor reserved for the Master Emerald! Oh, someday that massive hunk of precious stone will be all mine...

Well, as much as I like to keep my options open... I must admit, I do have a type. There's no better way to get my engines purring than a stern, strong-willed guy -- or gal! -- with a hidden heart of gold.

Ah...
...Well, you know me, Amy -- my one true love is jewels. Still, should Knuckles ever let his guard down enough to take my flirting seriously, I... certainly wouldn't hate it.

Ah...
...Well, you know me, Amy -- I like to keep my options open. But if, by some miracle, Shadow ever started to see me as more than just a friend... I'd be glad to return his feelings.

Ah...
...Ask me again tomorrow, Amy, and I might have a different answer. But right now, in this moment...? I kind of miss what Topaz and I used to have.
If I'm the one in charge? It's hard to beat cowgirl. I get to set the speed, depth, and angle to maximize my pleasure... and he gets to see all of me in my dazzling, naked glory.

What can I say? I'm a very useful asset -- and far too slippery to lock up for long. So as long as they can keep using my skills, GUN finds it easiest to overlook what I do off the clock... {small}even if that drives poor Topaz up the wall sometimes.{!reset}

Why, Jura... Such envy is unbecoming of a lady! I'll have you know I was a master thief long before my little arrangement with the government. But it sounds like you haven't yet found what it takes to reach my level, hmm...?

Fufufu... To be fair, darling, my little arrangement with GUN is more what I'd call a side gig -- I'm a freelance treasure hunter before all else. Still, I'm glad to hear the girls have earned your stamp of approval!
Goodness, Revy...! I'm a field agent, not a bureaucrat -- my talents would be utterly wasted behind a desk. Still, it's always a pleasure to know my cleavage isn't going unappreciated!

To be honest, Revy, I'm really more of an independent contractor. But if you're going to get fucked by the government either way, the least they can do is send somebody who'll make you look forward to it, hmm?

Ha...! As a matter of fact, my handler's more the type you're talking about. Why Topaz insists on wearing that bulky old uniform, I'll never know... But I'm glad that my cleavage, at least, exceeds your expectations.
Why, Fina, I haven't a clue what you're talking about! From the sound of it, though, you've been "inspecting" me quite keenly... Like what you've seen so far?
When it comes to cuteness, you're not too bad yourself, sugar! But in any case, if it's a real good look at me that you're after, maybe there's something I can do...
For a sweet thing like you, Sucrose darling, I'm an open book! Ask away.
Oh, you do, do you, sugar...? Well, a lady's got to have her secrets -- but who knows? Maybe I'm in the mood to humor you.

Mm, well, I'm certainly no taxonomist... and your ears by themselves aren't that much to go off of. But if I had to wager a guess? Between the darkened ear-tips and your inquisitive mind, I'd peg you as a fox.
Mmmm... Not particularly. Why, do you have a habit of going to the zoo and having an existential crisis in front of the chimpanzee enclosure?
Mmm, I can't say that's ever really bothered me. Those types of bats are about as far-removed from my kind as you are from a gorilla!
All your treasure, you say? Well, I'm sorry to hear that it's no longer in your possession. Still, just what kind of beautiful, dazzling riches did I miss out o-- did you end up losing?

You? Hard to say without looking at your family tree. But my kind aren't crossbreeds -- biologically speaking, we and homo sapiens are entirely distinct. Though I have been known to have some human in me from time to time...
No hints from me, Nami -- though I'm sure you'd appreciate the absolutely dazzling sight of my collection almost as much as I do! Such a shame that giving you a tour would be playing with fire...

Oh, I assure you that I've put together quite the dazzling display! I'll admit, it's almost tempting to show it off to such a kindred spirit as yourself -- but, well, secret hideaways are secret for very good reasons.
Oh, I assure you, kitty -- if there's gonna be any blushing around here, it won't be me doing the lion's share. Why don't I show you exactly what I mean?
As far as I'm concerned, handsome, blushing is something that happens to other people -- especially when I make it happen. But talk is cheap -- shall I demonstrate?
Oh, you'll hear no argument from me, handsome... In fact, I'm looking forward to seeing just how cozy we'll get by the end of the night.
Fufu... Well, there are a few heroes back home who can vouch for my character. But when it comes to how well I play nice with the good guys, maybe you'd prefer to find out firsthand.

Me, an animal? How rude. It's taxonomically correct, I suppose, but I'd hardly consider myself on the same level as a Pocky or a Flicky -- hold on. You think... we look like humans? With "other features"?

Not as often as you might think -- even when I'm not dealing with robots, it's usually easier to lean on the other skills in my repertoire. Still, I have been known to go for seduction if I figure I’ll enjoy the results...

Yes, well... Thankfully, the authorities where I come from are far more reasonable! So long as I'm willing to lend GUN a hand whenever a mad scientist or world-ending terror rears its ugly head, they're willing to overlook my little hobby.

Yes, well... As they say, "If you can't beat them, join them!" Since they can't hold me for long, the feds find it easier to overlook my indiscretions -- so long as I help GUN take down the occasional global threat from time to time.
Well, when it comes to my burglaries, I do always fly solo. But whenever it's time to put a stop to the schemes of Dr. Eggman and his ilk, usually I work with Shadow and Omega on Team Dark!
Oh, I assure you I can pull off most any heist all by my lonesome! But whenever GUN calls in a favor to make use of my espionage skills, they usually assign Topaz as my partner and handler.

Without a doubt, it just has to be the Master Emerald! That gorgeous hunk of rock can shrink down when its bearer wills it -- but in its natural state, it's well over nine feet tall, with a diameter to match!

Oh, I'm never one to let a little full frontal get between me and fabulous riches... Humans aside, most guys back home wear little more than gloves and shoes in the first place. So it's only fair if they get an eyeful every once in a while, too, no?

Nami, are you familiar with one Princess Sally Acorn? She's a courageous freedom fighter, a caring leader... and rarely wears more than a vest and boots. I'd be a sorry excuse for a master thief if I couldn't match that naked resolve, no?

Oh, believe me, it's come up before -- and I go for the treasure every time, no regrets! Of course, that doesn't mean it isn't troublesome sometimes... Like the time I raided some seaside temple ruins for a lapis lazuli statuette.
Well, I did grow up with lots of cousins and uncles and aunts... and my dear Mama, of course. But I haven't touched base with any of them in ages.

Oh, where to even begin...? The most famous would be the Chaos Emeralds -- even just one of these brilliant jewels hold enough chaos energy to warp reality. But all seven combined are said to grant their wielder ultimate power!

Oh, where to even begin...? If I were to pick my favorite, it'd have to be the Master Emerald. Not only is it huge and breathtakingly dreamy -- it's also the most powerful relic on the planet, surpassing even the Chaos Emeralds!

Oh, where to even begin...? Well, I've always thought that the Sol Emeralds are surprisingly underrated. They're interdimensional counterparts to the Chaos Emeralds -- and have a pyrokinetic princess for a guardian!
Oh, where to even begin...? Well, one of the most peculiar would have to be the Phantom Ruby. It's a mysterious jewel that's able to create illusions that seem so real, they actually affect reality!
Oh, where to even begin...? Well, one of the more interesting ones would be the Warp Topaz. It was capable of opening localized wormholes, allowing the user to travel vast distances in an instant!
Fufu... Guilty as charged. In my defense, Fluttershy, I simply cannot abide panty lines -- but now you've got me wondering just what kind of ideas you've been giving yourself. Excited, are we?
Oh? You say that like you've already settled for a different path in life... Still, at least one of us can bring out the big guns.

I'm not quite sure what you mean by "feral" -- as far as bats go, I'd like to think I'm pretty high-class! That said, alley-cat... If you're hoping to see me a little more au naturale, perhaps I can throw you a fishbone.

In theory? Just about anything! Even a single Emerald can be used to warp time & space, power formidable machines, or perform other miracles. Uniting all seven, meanwhile, is said to grant their wielder unlimited power -- and from what I've seen, that's not too far off!
Oho...! A gentleman thief, I see. Too many in our profession seem to forget their manners, don't they, Mister Cooper? But please, call me Rouge.
Please, darling, call me Rouge -- and rest assured that there's plenty of pleasure to go around. It's been a while since such a gentlemanly raccoon graced my presence, after all!
Is that so? Well, I'm hardly the type to loiter around mouldy old graveyards -- but if you want to see more of me, then I've got just the treat for you.
Well, that depends, sugar. Does spending your breath on such coquettish ripostes sound like your idea of a good time?

Yes, and you're a scientist -- who's been sneaking furtive glances at my cleavage, I might add. Now that we've gotten the obvious out of the way, Heris darling, did you have a more probing line of inquiry for me?
By all means, Hu Tao, assert away. At the very least, I can count it as proof that you're interested in me for more than just my body.
Fufu... You flatter me, darling! Not that you should stop, mind you.

Goodness, Leon... we've barely begun and that silver tongue has already failed you? Well, there's no shame in a little performance anxiety -- but I've got just the thing to perk your wit right up again.
My, my, Leon... Are you really going to make the woman do all the work? How shameless of you! But here's a hint: a lady doesn't show off this much cleavage just to hear all about her beautiful eyes.

I'm not sure whether to be flattered or insulted by your insinuations -- but I assure you, every inch of my body is 100% natural. Even if that weren't true, I don't see why it should matter... One of my best friends was grown in a lab, after all!
I don't much like getting ganged up on... Well, aside from in exactly the way your dirty little minds are picturing.
My, my... Leading the pack, am I? Guess that means it's up to me to set the mood.
My, my... Looks like I'm to~background.time~'s opening act. I'd better make it an attention-grabber, shouldn't I?
Really made you work for that win, didn't I?
And here I'd begun to think you'd all forgotten about little old me.
It’s my loss, is it...? Oh, you’ll hear no complaints from me. As a matter of fact, I kinda like being in the spotlight!
Me again? Okay, but don't get too excited... I may have given you one freebie, but you'll have to work a lot harder to see the rest of the goods.
Well, if you're that eager to undress me, who am I to deny you?
Eh. Even I can't win them all.
Oopsie.
All part of the fun, my dears.
Oh! Oh, woe is me... I'm not fooling anyone, am I?
Hah... It seems talent and beauty can get a girl only so far.
Hmph. Showing off my body is no problem at all... It's the "losing" part that really gets under my skin.
Fine, fine, you win this one. Just don't let it go to your head, alright?
I'd be lying if I said I didn't see this coming...
Yeah, yeah, okay. You don’t need to tell me twice...!

While I'm grateful for the ego boost, darling, you shouldn't sell yourself short either! A beauty like yours could go amazingly far in the modeling industry... Although whether you'd care for all that attention is another matter entirely.
While I'm grateful for the ego boost, darling, you shouldn't sell yourself short either! And besides, matters of taste aside -- {small}aesthetic or otherwise{!reset} -- it still takes two to tango.
Amazing, huh? Well, it's a start. Still, with a shirt that tight, I can tell you've got quite the lovely pair yourself!
Amazing, huh? Well, it's a start. Still, I think I speak for everyone when I say you've got quite the lovely pair yourself!

"A neutral location, outside of Angel Island..." Leaving the Master Emerald a nice, juicy target for any thief who decides not to show up as promised? That'll be his first thought -- and though I'm ashamed to say it, it was mine, too.

And when he shows up to this "neutral location" at the promised time, what's to stop me from being on Angel Island, stealing the Master Emerald? Surely he'd think I'd be tempted... and what's worse, he'd probably be right.
Oho...? Sounds like you're speaking from experience! Don't tell me sweet little Amy Rose isn't actually as virginal as she appears...
My, spoken with such confidence...! Are we talking about the fantasies you indulge in during your "alone time," or do you have more hands-on experience than you've been letting on?

That would be the mature thing to do, yes. Sadly, when you always hide your true intentions behind teasing and misdirection, no one believes you when you're actually honest -- if you even remember how to be in the first place.

That would be the mature thing to do, yes... But on the other hand, I don't want to make things awkward between us, either. Shadow has so few friendships already -- I'd never forgive myself if I ended up ruining ours.

That would be the mature thing to do, yes... Still, I don't like my chances. The only girl he's ever loved is Maria -- not like that, mind you! But even if he is ready to open his heart again, I couldn't be less like her if I tried.
Ufufu... Tell me, Miss Rose -- how familiar are you with the art of burlesque?

What's there to tell? For a while, we were friends with benefits -- nothing serious, mind you. It was comfy, blowing off steam together without expecting more to come of it... But then Topaz had to go and get engaged, the floozy.

I appreciate the sentiment, darling... Jewels might stay beautiful forever, but I'm nearly 25 -- and with every passing year, I feel my chances slipping away. If "someday" doesn't come soon, I fear I'll end up a lonely old hag...
Who knows...? Knuckles has to win every time -- I only have to get lucky once. And, well... he hardly has a perfect track record.
Ufufu... Consider it proof that I've got nothing to hide. After all, it's only fair that you get the chance to size up my assets, too!

Mmmm... You could say that. Mostly, you'll only see wings on bats like me -- but we're far from the only species you'll find back home. There's hedgehogs, foxes, rabbits, cats... Why, depending on where you go, humans are the rare ones!

Biologically speaking, I'm not really "human" on any level... But we've got homo sapiens back home, too. My partner, Topaz, is one -- and of course, there's the infamous Dr. Eggman. You'd hate him; sometimes, he uses small animals to power his robots.
You know what? I'm feeling a little sorry for a certain pink-haired cutie pie who's had a spot of bad luck. Why don't I help her feel a little less lonely in her exhibitionism, hmmmm?

What's that, Ms. Mumbles? Did you really think I was calling you a total vixen in that sense? Sorry to say it, but I only intended the single entendre -- although now that you mention it, maybe I should have gone for the double.

Well, why didn't you say so...? I didn't realize you were a shutterbug as well as a rocker and a wrestler -- but if it's a pin-up shot you're looking for, I'd be happy to add the flash to your photography.

My, so many probing questions...! You know what, sweet thing -- let's run a little experiment right now. I'm about to bare it all for you, so why not take it all in and then tell me what's running through that head of yours?

Why, ~adrien~...! Are you suggesting I have an ulterior motive for showing off so soon?
Fufu... Clever boy.

Besides my very active lifestyle? I follow a vigorous martial arts regimen that combines wing and leg power for devastating kicks. All told, I work hard to keep my body in prime condition -- so I hope you appreciate the effort.

Nice save -- but honestly? You're overthinking it. At the end of the day, humans just look like humans. Yes, there are some vague similarities with my kind, but you're mostly your own thing... Your own exotic, alluring thing.

Oh, you could say that... I've honed my kicking techniques to devastating effect, and I've got my share of bombs and other tricks. But I'm plenty skilled in subtler arts -- like thievery and stealth -- as well.
Fufu... Consider this a consolation prize, darling. Even if it's not quite the display you were hoping for, I can assure you it's almost as magnificent!

Well, if ~player~ has any jewels on ~player.ifMale(him|her)~, then I make no promises -- it's not like ~player.ifMale(he'll|she'll)~ die without them, after all. But I'd never stoop so low as to steal the food from somebody's mouth, if that's what you mean.

Reaching the treasure was a breeze -- but I wasn't the only one there for it. As soon as I picked it up, Fiona Fox tackled me into a trap that sliced both our clothes to ribbons. I had to brawl her and the Babylon Rogues all the way to the exit!

Wait -- you also lost friends that day?
{small}...Oh, sure, how could I ever relate? It's not like I've ever watched a friend seemingly die fighting the Biolizard, or succumb to the Metal Virus and turn into a Zombot, or anything like that.{!reset}
Fufu... Why the surprise, Meia darling? Planet full of women; surely this won't be the first pair of boobs you've seen besides your own.
Fufu... Think it through, Meia dear -- surely I must have a reason! Maybe I'm leveraging my assets to gain a tactical advantage. Maybe I'm just an exhibitionist. Care to float a theory of your own?
What can I say? When it comes to taking what I want, I don't waste time. But tell me, darling -- isn't there something that you desire?
Looking to put that poet's tongue to better use, hmm? While your offer might be a little premature, I can't say I disapprove.
Does it...? My, my. I wonder who might be prepared to provide such a luxurious service.
Does it? My, my... And here I thought you'd decided to take things slow. Whatever happened to all of that quality time you promised me before the main event?
Oh, not at all. In fact, why don't I give you some more data to peruse?
Me, an assassin? Perish the thought -- though I have scrapped my fair share of robots. That said, you'd be surprised how quickly a little well-timed sabotage can make a villain's plans crumble.

Well, I have scrapped my fair share of robots -- but think less "assassination" and more "infiltration and sabotage." It's easy to discount the damage a thief can do until she's swiped the power source of your superweapon at a critical moment.

Oh, I'm sorry...! I guess the next time poor Dr. Eggman tries to conquer the world with an orbital death ray or turn all organic life into his robotic slaves, we should just stand aside. {small}I swear, Sonic and his friends never have to put up with this PR rubbish.{!reset}

Eggman's a nickname, hun. Take a wild guess -- between Team Dark and Dr. Ivo Robotnik, who uses woodland creatures as living batteries for his army of killer robots? Now, don't go straining your wits too hard on that one.

Heist partner...? Ha -- Topaz would sooner thwart my burglaries than aid them. But when it comes to spy work, there's no one I'd rather have watch my back -- she's sharp, surprisingly sneaky, and knows her way around guns and explosives.

It would be... were it not for its guardian. I swear, Knuckles is even more stubborn than he is handsome... So what if the Emerald is the prized relic of his extinct tribe and the only thing holding his floating island aloft? It'd still have a better home in my collection!

Guys do find it a little embarrassing to get caught "excited" in public -- but since they can't do much to control it, nobody really minds. Even then, you see it far less often than you'd think... that is, unless you're trying to turn them on.

Hard to say, really -- most guys back home wear little more than gloves and boots, and Sally's always been a tomboy of sorts. That said, maybe she does get some sort of sexual thrill out of it, too -- but if so, she hides it well!
A crocodile, huh...? I just so happen to know one who runs a detective agency. Vector's loud-mouthed and bad with money, but he's at least halfway decent at what he does.

A bear, huh...? I've never met the guy myself, but some friends of mine had run-ins with a polar bear named Bark. Surprisingly shy and gentle, I've been told, but tends to fall in with the wrong crowd.

My family's not the only bats in the world -- you can find at least a small community in most cities back home! If you're really that keen on adopting one, visit an orphanage... Just don't forget that we're people, not pets.
You know what? I feel sorry for ~forfeit~ over there, stroking himself while I'm as decent as can be. Why don't I give you something a bit juicier to work with, hmmm...?
You know what? I feel sorry for ~forfeit~ over there, touching herself while I'm as decent as can be. Why don't I give you something a bit juicier to work with, hmmm...?
Fufu... The rest of you can stall with trinkets all you like, but I'm feeling a little bolder. Why don't I give you all what you really came for, hmmm...?
Fufu... Most folks around here are so slow to give up the goods -- but I say if you've got 'em, flaunt 'em. Why don't I show you exactly what I mean...?
Fufu... You know what? I'm feeling particularly generous right now. So why don't I give you all a treat right off the bat...?
