You know, Amy, I've been wondering... What makes you so certain that Sonic is your "one true love"? Sure, he's fun and heroic and pretty easy on the eyes -- but so are plenty of other folks, too.

Come to think of it, Amy... All these years and I've never asked why you're so fixated on Sonic in particular. I mean, sure, he's a great catch! But with all the other fish in the sea, what makes you so certain he's the only one for you?
Now that I think about it, it's been a little while since we last met up, hasn't it, sweetie? I trust you've kept yourself plenty busy in the meantime.
It really has been too long since the last time we caught up, Amy. So, aside from compulsively stalking the world's fastest hedgehog, what have you been up to lately?
To be frank, Amy... I'm getting a little sick of this cat-and-mouse game you and Sonic keep playing. I have half a mind to make sure you actually bed him -- or at least an acceptable substitute.

Really, though, Amy... You and Sonic have been at this for years. Isn't it high time you two settled it once and for all? I'll even help you bed him -- or anyone else -- if that's what it'll take to wrap up this little farce.

I must say, I really am glad that we can get along fine these days. Sure, I used to think of you as little more than a particularly tenacious brat -- but back in the Resistance, you really proved your mettle!
I get the feeling, Fina darling, that you're relatively green to this whole Air Pirate business. So...? How are you enjoying your newfound life among rogues on the open skies?

Say, Revy... A little birdie told me you used to put on some very steamy S&M shows. But behind closed doors, is that what the "Scarlet Queen" is really into? Or did you just play the domme to pay the bills?
I can't say I've ever had cause to visit Roanapur for long... There's just not many jewels to be found there, even illicitly. That said, Revy, does the city offer anything you're truly fond of?
Come to think of it, darling, Roanapur might not have much in the way of jewels. But if even half the rumors are to be believed, the city's got at least one Rock worth polishing, hmmm?
I've heard of the infamous Two Hands by reputation, but it's a pleasure to finally put a face to the name... to say nothing of that ravishing body. I'm sure we'll get on like a house on fire.
Say, sugar... I'm more of a "pleasure before business" type of girl, but what about you? Do you prefer to unwind in a place like this only after a job well done, or is this more how you prepare?
Now that I get a good look at those pistols... Those are custom Beretta 92Fs, aren't they? Extended barrels, if I'm not mistaken?
You know, Fluttershy darling, I can't help but notice that fascinating little crystal you've got hanging around your neck. It's not the sort of item that you can find just anywhere, now, is it?

So, tell me, sugar... What compels a demure little thing like you to try out a game like this? I can understand wanting to break out of your shell, but there's plenty of ways to do that without baring it all for complete strangers.
Ufufu... Forgive me for saying so, sugar, but "Fluttershy" seems like quite the fitting appellation. But even if you're not so good with people, I hear that animals are more your forte?

I wonder... You might have trouble hitting it off with your fellow humans, Fluttershy. But since you simply adore animals, do folks who are a little more beastly -- such as moi -- put you more at ease?
Forgive my rudeness, Fina, but I get the sense that... oh, how should I put it...? ...you're not exactly a 100% natural-born human. Just what is it that sets a Silvite like you apart from most folks?

Forgive my saying so, Fina, but I've gotten a certain vibe from you that I've only seen from Shadow before. Now, you're no lab-grown Ultimate Life Form -- but as a Silvite, you're not quite a natural-born human either, no?

case.state: You know, the thing about ship voyages is that you spend a lot of time on a cramped vessel, with the same few folks and precious little to do. So... You ever invited a crew member to your bunk? Or have you still not found yourself a first mate?

So, Fina -- as air pirates, your whole deal is to seek out floating islands, then claim the dazzling treasures -- especially magic jewels -- hidden there, no? I'd just love to hear your crew's usual modus operandi.

state.text: So you're an up-and-coming rocker, mm? Tell me, Darling -- what types of venues have you typically played for so far?

I must admit, most scientists I've crossed paths with could be called a public menace -- but you don't strike me as the megalomaniacal type at all. So tell me, sweet thing... What kind of experiments have you been running?

Say -- as an alchemist, you wouldn't happen to know anybody who's cracked that old "lead into gold" problem, would you? Or learned how to turn normal rocks into precious jewels? I know that's not really your field of study, but still...

My, my... In my experience, the kind of person who prowls about on rooftops in a sleek black suit is typically in my line of work. You sure you're a bona-fide hero and not a fellow burglar, kitty-cat?
Let me see if I've got the full picture... When your little Kwami friend merges with your ring, that triggers your transformation and grants you his power, yes?

So, kitty-cat... When you're not romping about on your rooftop escapades, you're living the life of a high-class model? That's no surprise -- why, a face like yours is categorically suited for being plastered across billboards.

You know, as nice as it must be to be born in the lap of luxury, I've never met a single person who's fully satisfied with what they've got. So tell me, rich boy -- what have you always wanted that money can't buy?

If that dress is anything to go by, Perona dear, I bet you’d get along famously with Honey the Cat! Her fashion label has put out more than a few clothing lines that would be right up your alley -- lots of red and black; plenty of lace.
So, besides the whole ghost summoning thing, the reason you're able to fly is also because of that fruit you ate, right? My, my... Produce like that must be worth a pretty penny.

So you're the so-called "Ghost Princess," hmmm? My, my... One just can't help but wonder how deep this rabbit hole goes. Do you live in a Ghost Castle? Do you rule the Ghost Kingdom yourself, or are you simply next in line to the spooky throne?
By the by, sugar, that's quite the lovely arm tattoo. Is there a story behind it? Or are you just a fan of all things that go flap in the night?
You know, they say it's always the quiet ones... So, now that I'm sure you can handle it, I just have to ask. Fluttershy, darling -- what's your wildest, kinkiest sexual fantasy?

You know, Sucrose darling, I've been meaning to ask about that intriguing little brooch you've got as your cape-clasp -- I can't say I've seen a gemstone quite like it. Judging by the glow, it must be awfully magical, no?
So you've got an interest in exploring ruins, hmm? One wonders what commodities are of such grave import to an alchemist like you that you feel compelled to delve into peril to claim them yourself.

By the by, sugar -- while I get wanting to better familiarize yourself with the unwritten rules of social interaction, why do it a strip poker joint of all places? Sounds like throwing yourself straight into the deep end if you ask me.
Say, if that magic pendant of yours lets you talk to animals... Basically, you've got your very own personal spy network, no? I'm sure you must have learned all sorts of fascinating secrets.

So tell me, Darling... When you step into the ring, what kinds of skills are you packing? I've been known to host some prize fights at Club Rouge, but the combatants are typically pretty heavy hitters -- with special abilities to boot.
Well, aren't you the spitting image of a model student...! No wonder you've come to blow off steam at a place like this -- keeping up appearances must be so exhausting.

Now, here's a gal with an image to maintain... If your classmates knew what you got up to outside of school hours, I bet they'd be a lot more surprised than they really ought to be. Even an ace student has to relieve stress somehow, no?

So, Sucrose, tell me about the more exhaustive side of your interpersonal research. Do you have a certain "type" that you're looking to experiment with? Or do you simply hope to collect as many data samples as your body can take?
So you say you're an angel, darling? Not fallen or anything? My, my... Heaven must be very different from what I've imagined.

Tell me, is your whole ghost-hunting business actually all that relevant? Can't say I've ever seen any ghosts that weren't in old ruins or secluded mansions -- and even then, they're harmless if you keep your distance.

Say, Nami... When a gal has such luxurious tastes as you, surely she's got a kink or two that's no less lavish! What's a dirty fantasy you've always wanted to try, but would need a lot of riches on hand for?
From the sound of it, Nami darling, you've seen quite a lot in your travels. But amidst all those exotic locales, would you say that there's fabulous treasures to be found on the high seas, too?

"Cat Burglar" Nami, hmm...? It doesn't take three guesses to figure out how you earned that title. But on the rare occasion you get caught in the act, what's your go-to move for getting yourself out of trouble?

It must be quite the relief your partner's happy to let you show off like this -- especially given your day job. Say, how risqué have you gone in photoshoots, anyway? I'm sure there's plenty of fans who'd lap up your two-page spread.
You know, sweet thing... Between bioalchemy and interpersonal relations, there's a pretty obvious thread. You ever think about merging your two study topics and making new life the old-fashioned way?

Say, darling... If creating life is part and parcel to bioalchemy, have you ever considered aiding your other studies by making your very own Ultimate Lover? I mean, one of my best friends was made in a lab, and he turned out an absolute hunk.
Well, look at you...! Let me guess -- just crawled out of your deep, dark cave, only to stand blinking in the harsh light of day for the very first time in your life? Trust me, I've been there.
So, your psychic powers let you control fire, ice, and lightning, right, darling? That's quite the impressive skill set -- most psychics I know have somewhat more specialized gifts.
Say... Unless my eyes deceive me, you've got some kind of pendant tucked beneath that hoodie of yours. I trust it comes with a story...? You don't strike me as the type to accessorize frivolously.
So tell me, kitty -- how does a street-level thief like you get her paws on immortality, anyway? I'm sure there's quite the yarn behind it.

If it's not too crass of me to ask, darling... Has your dismemberment had much effect on your sex life? I could imagine detachable body parts scaring away most suitors -- or attracting entirely the wrong sort.
My, my... We're quite the matching set, aren't we, alley-cat? It wouldn't surprise me if we end up stealing the competition's hearts -- to say nothing of whatever else might strike our fancies.

I must admit, Nadia -- while I'm usually the type to fly solo, I've taken quite the shine to you. Ever consider finding yourself a partner? Between your skills and mine, we could accomplish such dazzling feats together.
So, Nadia darling, do you have much experience with the nightlife of New Meridian? I hear the city's quite the hotbed of decadence and vice -- not that I mind one bit.
My, my... It really is a comfort to see a furry face amongst all the humans that frequent this joint! That said, Sly darling, you're a little overdressed to fit in with the boys back home.

My, my... To think we'd have more than one master thief at the table! I should warn you, Mr. Cooper -- if you're looking to steal some hearts to~background.time~, you'll need some pretty bold moves to claim mine.

case.state: So you're the sort of thief who lives by a code of honor, hmm? Can't say I've ever had much use for such a thing -- though as a jewel thief, there's not much point in burgling from the working class anyway!

state.text: Say, Hu Tao... You've overseen all kinds of funeral rites, so I've just got to ask. Whenever kings and pharaohs of outrageous fortune kick the bucket, they'll often fill their tombs to near-bursting with treasure. But doesn't that ever feel like a waste to you?

Fufu... If our little tête-à-tête has taught me anything so far, it's that you're the type who lives entirely by her own whims. Still, I wonder how often those whims have carried you into the bed of some lovely stranger...
Look alive, everyone -- it's time for our dear Miss Funeral Director to take the stage! That said, sugar, I'm sure you're no stranger to stiff competition.

So tell me, Leon -- do you have a sweetheart back home waiting for you? Most folks wouldn't join this kind of game if they did, but, well... You'd hardly be the first Kennedy to spice up his married life with a little fun on the side.

I see you've brought along your trusty pistol, Leon -- but when you're on the job, wouldn't you typically carry something a little more high-caliber? For agents of GUN, at least, an automatic rifle is standard-issue.

Dealing with mad doctors and man-made horrors all the time must be no less exhausting for you, I'm sure... Is it a relief when you get to deal with normal crime for a change? Or is that kind of thing below your pay grade these days?

You know, Leon, I've had to deal with a Zombot crisis before -- but real zombies sound even worse! All that gore and decay sounds positively revolting... and your friend gets turned, there's no undoing that.

Fufu... I must admit, I wasn't expecting to meet another special agent in a game like this. Even if our goals don't exactly align, I trust you'll know when to look the other way... and when to really stare.

I might be a master thief, but I don't mind cozying up to government agents -- so long as they're as dreamy as you, anyway. But if it comes down to spoiling my fun or joining in, I trust you'll make the right decision, too, no?

Speaking of what's "standard-issue"... Does everyone in your unit wear their shirts that tight, or is yours more a matter of personal preference? Not that I'm complaining, mind you -- quite the opposite, in fact.
My goodness, lover boy -- you really are on the ropes, aren't you? But surely an agent of your caliber has one last hidden weapon to reveal... Let's just hope it's truly formidable.

case.state: Nice try, sweetie -- but if you were looking for an easy mark, you picked the wrong gal.
Sugar, don't think I haven't picked up on your little tricks... If cheating's on the table, I guess I'll just have to do it better than you.

state.text: Something's not quite right with this one, is it...? Believe me, I know how to spot bats in the belfry.
A robot...? Please tell me you're not one of Eggman's creations -- I'd hate for Omega to suddenly burst in halfway through the game, guns blazing.
A robot...? I hope for your sake, ~name~, that you're no Badnik -- if you were, I doubt Omega would leave little more of you than a smoking crater.
~Name~... Please tell me you’re not one of Eggman's robots. I'd hate to have such a lovely game ruined by one of Omega's anti-Badnik rampages... {small}again.{!reset}
A detective, hmm...? I wonder, ~name~, if you're a match for the fine team at the Chaotix Detective Agency -- or at least have a better business model.
So, tell me, ~target.ifMale(Mr.|Ms.)~ Detective... Are you really here to relax and have fun? Or are you snooping as usual?
Oh, lovely… Please tell me you don't intend to collect a bounty on my head, ~name~. I'm here to unwind, not to beat down every merc looking for a fight.
Something tells me you're the adventurous sort, ~name~... No doubt you'd fit right in with Big Blue's merry band of friends.
Now, who do we have here...? Certainly no stranger to the open road or the lure of adventure -- spend enough time around Sonic and his friends and you'll recognize that spirit of derring-do anywhere.
You're not exactly the law-abiding type, are you, ~name~...? Not that I mind -- just leave any jewels to me and we'll get along fine.
My, it seems I'm not the only one here with a checkered past... Not that it really matters to me. Just stay out of my way and I'll stay out of yours.
Oh, splendid… I never thought I'd meet anyone more love-obsessed than Amy Rose, but it seems I was sorely mistaken.
Oh, lovely, it's one of those types... Just my luck to find somebody who makes Amy Rose's affections seem gentle and mild by comparison.
The quiet type, are we...? Well, ~name~, that's fine by me. I'm looking forward to finding out just how loud you can get by the end of the night.
Why, it seems we've got a seasoned combatant on our hands! Me, I'm more of a lover than a fighter... but let me tell you, ~name~ -- I'm one hell of a fighter.
My, my... For such a seedy diversion, you're certainly dressed to the nines, aren't you, ~name~? I think I like you already.
Ouh la la...! Looks like somebody's determined to turn this game into a classy affair. ~Name~, I like you already.
Mmm... I can appreciate the choice to bring a touch of class to such a risqué affair. ~Name~, I think you and I are going to get along just fine.
How generous of you to grace the rest of us with your stately presence, ~name~. By the by, surely a royal like yourself has a gem-filled treasure vault tucked away somewhere, no...?
To think we'd find someone like ~name~ in a game like this...! Why, it must be my lucky day -- I do so love royals and their... opulent tastes.
Don't tell me you couldn't see this coming, Future ~target.ifMale(Boy|Girl)~.
Well well, well... It's your loss, ~name~. Still, I'm sure this next part will come easy to you -- since you've got plenty of experience as a private investigator.
Well, ~name~, I hope you're feeling especially adventurous -- because it's time for you to show us some exhaustive self-exploration.

Say it with me, ~name~:
"It's no use!"

I've prattled on about jewels enough for now -- so let's talk about you, darling. What brings such a stiff, no-nonsense Mejaran to a game like this? "Intellectual" curiosity about men can't be the only reason, surely!
Say, Meia -- what can you tell me about all the kinds of dazzling gemstones that can't be found on Earth? From what little I've heard, these so-called Paksis crystals sound especially intriguing.
If this is your usual luck, you're welcome at my casino any day.
My, my, ~name~... How's that strategy working out for you?

case.state: Thanks for taking the bullet, darling... but don’t think I owe you one!
Oh, thank goodness... That was a bit too close for comfort.
Wasn't expecting the save, but I'm not complaining! Thanks, sugar.

state.text: Oho...? Well, ~name~, I'm glad we have such a fine masculine specimen stripping for us today.
If you want to preserve your modesty, ~name~, I'd gladly accept a nice jewel or two instead...

case.state: Sorry, but I’m not the kind of girl who goes down quite that easy.
Easier than taking diamonds from a jewelry store.
Don't feel bad, ~target.ifMale(handsome|sweetie)~ -- you're playing against the best.
Heh. Piece of cake.
So, do you give up yet?
Ooh! Poor luck... for you, that is.
Yes, that is the trouble with playing fair, isn't it?
Don't tell me I've stolen your heart already, ~name~...? Why, I'm just barely getting started.
Sorry, ~name~, force of habit... I mean, all successful casinos make sure the house always wins, right?
Easier than swiping treasure out from under the noses of... Nic & Fiona? Rough & Tumble? The Babylon Rogues? I've outfoxed a lot of inferior treasure hunters over the years.
Well, ~name~...? You know what to do -- it's in the name of the game, after all.
Ooh, too bad! But if it makes you feel any better, ~name~, nothing is flawless -- aside from the rarest of jewels, that is.
I’m sorry, ~name~, were you distracted by anything...?
You don’t seem like you’re playing at your best, ~name~... Are you finding it hard to focus on the game for some reason? Two big reasons, perhaps?
You keep sneaking glances my way, ~name~... Shouldn't you keep your eyes on your cards instead of the girls?
~name~, if you'd rather stare at my chest than try to win the game... Well, you'll hear no complaints from me.
Lesson One, ~name~: in poker, there's more to strategy than just the cards themselves -- and that counts double for strip poker.
Don't look at me. You lost that one all on your own.
Sorry, sweetie -- but if you want me to go down easy, you’ll have to make it worth my while.
Just because I don't mind showing off doesn't mean I'll make this easy for you.
You can’t stop the world's greatest thief from getting what she wants!
You’re not nearly as tough as you look, are you?
Looks like somebody’s no match for my charms!
Thankfully, your loss is our gain.
Buying me a little time, hm...? My, how gallant of you.
That eager to steal the spotlight, hmm? By all means, ~target.ifMale(handsome|darling)~ -- it's yours.
Why, ~name~...! And not a moment too soon, either.

state.text: Oh no, ~name~ -- you lost? Too bad, so sad.
Go on, ~name~... Dazzle me.
Time to lose a garment, ~name~... Make it something good and I might just reward you.
~name~'s turn...? It must be my lucky day.
What are you planning to lose? If you haven't decided, I might have one or two ideas...
Strip for us, ~name~. We're all so eager to see just what you've been covering up...
It's rude to keep a lady waiting, you know.
Look on the bright side, ~name~ -- given the state I'm in, I doubt you'll keep the spotlight for long.
Well... Even if I couldn't win, I'm still glad you keep losing.
Fufu... You'd better have something good for me, ~target.ifMale(big boy|sweetie)~.
Go on, ~name~ -- strip. Given the state that I'm in, it's the least you can do, isn't it?

case.state: It's cute that you thought you even had a chance against me.
Sugar, did you really believe you could beat me in a game like this? I own and run a casino.
Did you really think it would be that easy?
Sorry, ~name~ -- but I never fail my mission.
Hey, cheer up -- you didn’t do too poorly. Of course, you’d never be able to take down an elite agent like me.
Let this be a lesson, darling -- never underestimate an agent. You’ll get burned.
You weren’t half bad, ~name~ -- it’s a shame I’m just plain better.
Heh... "A" for effort, ~name~, but you were more than a little outclassed.
You’re not bad, ~name~... for an amateur.

state.text: Any objections...? No one? Well, ~name~, you know what to do.
Why, it looks like it's time for our reward. Well, ~name~...?
Well, well, well... It looks like you lost -- but you're fresh out of clothing! Do remind me, ~name~, what happens now...?
Well, that was certainly over fast...
You put up quite the fight! Shame it didn’t amount to much, hmmm...?
Face it, ~name~ -- there’s no way out of this one.
Well, ~name~... You know exactly what comes next, don't you?
A better outcome I couldn't have hoped for.
Well, ~name~...? Let's see if you can impress me.
~name~, ~name~, ~name~... You didn't think a little thing like losing was going to stop me from getting what I came for, did you?
Sorry, ~name~ -- but all's fair in love and war.
I suppose wealth and class don't always go hand-in-hand... For starters, a certain well-to-do possum I've met could stand to tidy up his lair and his looks.
My, isn't that the truth! Whenever Sonic and I helped each other blow off some steam, we'd go at it for... hours... Oh, shoot.

{small}Mm, not a bad strategy. Using their shared awkwardness to her advantage by bonding over it? That won't just break the ice, it'll give Sucrose an "in" to further develop their -- wait, did she just say friends?{!reset}
Oh? My, my... Not what I expected at all, but you've certainly got some exquisite taste. Sonic is plenty of fun in bed, too, but Vanilla knows... just how to... Oh, shoot.
{small}Oho? Methinks somebody's got a bit of a crush on Little Miss Shy here. Now, isn't that sugar-sweet...?{!reset}
Mmmm, but I'm sure you've got a small army of volunteers, no? The real trouble is sorting the earnest wheat from the self-serving chaff -- or perhaps I should say, finding your diamond in the rough?
Fufu... You hear that, lovebug? He adores you. Given the league he's in, you must be quite the gem as well!
Mmmm... Now you've got me wondering. Do those oh-so-gentle fingers of yours know aaaaall the best places to touch a bat to make her feel good?

Speaking of preferences, darling -- when it comes to your lovers, how do you feel about breasts? Big ones like mine are oh-so-fun to play with, but I know that some parties prefer more modest chests like -- oh, I don't know -- Sucrose's, maybe?
Mmm, that's fair -- after all, this much is certainly nothing I haven't seen before. It hasn't been that long since our last trip to the beach, has it?
Mmm, that's fair -- after all, this much is certainly nothing I haven't seen before. It hasn't been that long since our last visit to the hot springs, has it?
Mmm, that's fair -- after all, this much is certainly nothing I haven't seen before. It hasn't been that long since our last pool party, has it?
Mmm, that's fair -- after all, this much is certainly nothing I haven't seen before. It hasn't been that long since we last showered side-by-side, has it?
Oh? Now, that just begs the question of what you're worried about getting judged for -- although given the game we're playing, I might have a guess or two.
A one-of-a-kind collector's item, you say? My, my... Sounds like it's a cut above your standard, everyday gemstone. Tell me more!

That quick to follow your friends' lead, mmm? Well, then, I suppose it's a good thing you never fell in with the wrong crowd. But that aside -- now that you've had yourself a little taste of what goes on here, what are your impressions so far?

Oho? I wonder if your friends know just how big of an influence they have on you. But that aside -- now that you're giving us all a good look at your panties, is it every bit as fun as you'd hoped it would be?
Oho...? Well, if you're that fascinated by my body, you're welcome to study it as exhaustively as you'd like! After all... you're about to give me quite the captivating anatomy lesson yourself.
Honestly? I'd be happy with anything juicy that no one was supposed to find out about! Concealed crimes, shocking secrets, torrid love affairs... You know, that sort of thing.
Anything in particular, hmmm...? Fufu. Now that you mention it, I am curious -- what secrets have you uncovered that you deeply regret learning?
Oho? That does sound tempting... Go on, then. Let's hear all about how the suave, handsome Cat Noir "redeemed" a villain into a sticky, satisfied mess.
Oho? A villain-taming story does sound tempting... which is no doubt why you're using it to try and distract me from my original question. Let's hear those rumors!
...W-wait. What are you...

Well, in your case... Step One is to prove that you've matured in every sense. Show Sonic that you're not the clingy kid he first met, but a confident, alluring woman... who's learned to respect his independence and boundaries.

In your case, you'll need to strike the right balance between forward and casual. Show Sonic that you're ready and willing -- but don't pressure him into anything! If he can set the pace of the relationship, he'll be far more receptive.

Ha...! Honestly, though, Knuckles was lucky you were around to keep things organized. Ever thought about putting that knack for administration to good use elsewhere? Or have you left those days behind you?
Ha...! And here I thought I'd only gotten worse over the years. Honestly, though, girly -- you've really grown up. So on that note... Have you put any thought into what you want to do for a living?

Ha...! Sounds like my sass just rubbed off on you.
Who knows...? Maybe if we keep hanging out, you'll end up just like me one day.
Mmmm...? Well, if that truly wasn't your goal, then that's probably for the best -- Sonic's not really the jealous type anyway. That said, what would poor Dexter think if he knew you were here?
My, you must be awfully fond of ~player~, then! Which is funny, since I'm fairly sure I've never met ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ before in my life.
Ah, yes, the good Doctor... I swear, why can't Sonic and Ol' Eggy just settle the score once and for all? If you ask me, their whole archnemesis thing has gotten a little too codependent.

Ah, yes... It really is like clockwork, isn't it? Eggman hatches some nefarious scheme; Sonic races to stop him; they fight; "I hate that hedgehog!"; rinse and repeat. I just wish they'd stop dragging the rest of the planet into it.
Mmm, that's fair -- after all, this much is certainly nothing I haven't seen before. It hasn't been that long since our last visit to the hot springs, has it? Or the beach?

Maybe so -- but there are still plenty of other guys out there who are all those things! Why, Tails is... still too young. Knuckles... is too stern for your tastes. Big is... well, Big... My, you do have slim pickings.

Be as that may, you should still play the field a little before committing -- or else you'll always wonder what you might've missed out on! I bet ~player~, for one, would be happy to help you out with that...
There you go with all that talk of tarot again... I don't put much stock in "destiny" or "fate." But if you're really so certain, why not use those cards to foresee who my "true love" will be?
I swear, if you were really any good at reading cards, you'd be playing a lot better. But sure -- assuming fortune telling isn't all bunk, why don't you try and foresee who my "true love" will be?
Oh-ho-ho...! Your best friend's mother? How scandalous -- I like it. Still, I wonder how Cream would feel about her brand-new "dad"...

Your best friend's mother? My, my... Not what I expected at all, but you've certainly got some exquisite taste. That rabbit has aged like a fine wine -- and while she rarely gets the chance to use them, her skills are as sharp as ever.

Oh-ho-ho...! Your best friend's mother, hmmm? You know, she might be more receptive than you'd think -- having an empty bed for all those years would be hard on any woman, let alone a rabbit like her.

True friends and living free as the wind... Sounds a lot like a certain someone from back home. Still, that's as good a reason as any to embrace the treasure hunter's lifestyle -- though I'm sure all the actual treasure doesn't hurt, either!
Mmm...?

case.state: The "foundations of life," you say? My, my... Now that sounds steamy.

state.text: Oh? Well, consider my curiosity officially piqued. Just how gem-like are we talking, exactly?
My, what prurient reasoning... Well, either way, I'm impressed that you even mustered up the courage to join the fun! You hardly strike me as the type who'd be that in touch with her naughty side...

Well, I'm always looking for new talent to perform at Club Rouge. Maybe I could book your little band for a gig sometime... assuming you're up to my standards, of course. I'll have you know I have a very discerning ear!

Oh, you're no fun... But fine, have it your way. Still, now you've got me wondering exactly how valuable that trinket is to you! Would you consider it more precious than your first kiss? Your maidenhead?

Bone collection? {small}...No, I think I'll leave that low-hanging fruit on the branch after all.{!reset} Do you collect these bones simply out of morbid fascination, or do they serve a more practical purpose in your research?

case.state: Come, now, you can tell us! You're among friends, darling... some of whom might just be willing to make your dreams come true.

state.text: Come now, darling, just confess... Otherwise, some of us might start making lurid and embarrassing guesses! Like, for instance, that you want to put a friend on a leash and take her out for a walk -- or that you'd rather be mounted from behind and bred like a bitch in heat.

case.state: Oh, you're no fun... But fine, have it your way. Still, now you've got me wondering -- how exactly does a trinket like that aid in your alchemical endeavors, anyway?

state.text: A Clima-Tact, you say... While it certainly sounds useful, I can't say I'm enthused by any tool that lets folks change wind currents and summon lightning. Bad news for us flyers, you know.
...Wait. Nami. Tell me that isn't...
In other words, those roguish good looks are the only roguish thing about you, hmm? Truth be told, I expected as much -- for all my teasing, you hardly strike me as the Napoleon of Crime.

That's not too unlike how it works with Wisps -- they can also fuse with people to bestow super-powered transformations. So if the prerequisites are similar, too, that must mean Plagg trusts you tremendously...

Naturally, a handsome young man in your line of work must an earn equally handsome salary! Or, well -- I suppose it's gig-based, but you know what I mean. Just one more reason for all the gals and guys fawning over you, huh?

Uh-huh -- but when you do get to the inevitable part with the monsters, I expect they're not too receptive to negotiation. So do you try your best to go unnoticed? Or do you prefer a more aggressive approach?
Oh? Oho? You were going to say Moon Crystal, weren’t you? To think a dazzlingly magical gem has been part of you this whole time… My, how dreamy! So, is it embedded in your navel, or...?

Fufu... It's not all that complicated if you don't make it so, darling! Just pick a night and ask him to come to your room. Tell him to sit down with you on the bed. Lean in for a kiss; start to undress him... He'll catch on quick.

So it's a lady friend you've got your eye on... That does make things trickier. But I'd say you should simply sit down with this Aika and tell her your earnest feelings! If she seems receptive, start with a kiss, and... well, see where things go from there.

Oh? That sounds rough for the defeated crew -- but on the other hand, I'm sure that most law-abiding citizens would claim such criminals had it coming! Still, darling, how much sympathy would you say a known pirate deserves?
Oh? Pirate hunting sounds like quite the lucrative trade, then -- even before bounties come into it. Any ship that flies the Jolly Roger must be very bold... or very foolish.
Ahhh... Floating islands always do have the most amazing treasure, don't they? Though from the way you describe it, it doesn't sound like precious jewels you loaded up on...

Goodness! From the way you put it, it almost sounds like you intimidated the residents into letting you loot the place just so you'd leave them in peace. But of course, you're not the type to sugarcoat such dastardly doings, are you?
Fufu... It's so useful being underestimated, isn't it? When your marks don't think you're worth spending brain power on, it makes it so much easier to outwit them.

Mmm, well, I can't fault you for that -- I've done the same thing plenty of times, after all! Still, I'll take a mark for the other kind of ride if they're decent-looking and it won't hurt my goals -- but even that's just not for you, huh? Oh, you romantic.

Mmm, fair enough -- I've done the exact same thing more times than I can count. But you won't even do it if your mark's your type and it won't interfere with your plans? Don't tell me you're a secret romantic when it comes to sex...!

Liquid gold, you say...? That does sound intriguing -- although given its melting point, you'd obviously need some kind of magical protection against extreme heat. {small}So I suppose Blaze could indulge in something like that... Not that she seems like the type.{!reset}

Darling... I know exactly what you mean! The rivalry, the adrenaline, the slow boil of sexual tension... And then, at the moment when it all comes to a head, to straddle your rival and sate your animal lust together atop a gleaming pile of riches? Oh, I get all tingly just thinking about it!

Well, if you're on the prowl for cute followers here, I'd say you're pretty spoiled for choice -- so might want to narrow your search a bit. Tell me, just what kind of traits do you find especially charming?

That's a bit narrow-minded of you, isn't it? Not all bats are alike, you know! Why, if I judged all humans by the worst one I've met, I'd have to conclude that you're a deranged egotist who wants to... lord over a realm of... obedient puppets. Ah.

For starters? You might try her board of directors. But ultimately, Honey's a grown woman who makes her own decisions -- just like every cat, bat, hedgehog, or other kind of folk from back home. We're not pets.

Darling... Honey's a CEO whose salary dwarfs even mine. If you think you've got an offer that'd make her want to be your servant or roomie or whatever, you're welcome to try -- but you can't just scoop her up like some stray pet.
My, my... You really are a lucky one, aren't you, darling? Still, it makes a gal wonder how you came into possession of such a top-class Devil Fruit in the first place.
It does make a gal wonder, though -- how does a seller get their hands on one of these Devil Fruits in the first place? They certainly don't sound like your standard garden-variety plant.
...I was going somewhere else with that, but okay, I'll bite. Tell me, darling -- what are some of the worst Devil Fruit abilities you've seen?

My, what insatiable curiosity...! With so many experiments to conduct, I'm sure you'd want to get through them as efficiently as possible. Would it help if we formed a queue...? Or are you a talented multitasker?
Is that so...? Sounds like I'm about to find myself in quite the enviable position with you. Here's hoping we'll work our way through quite a few more, mm?

case.state: You're welcome to give it a try -- though I should warn you, only first place wins any prize money. Still, if you consider exposure and an ass-beating to be payment enough, I certainly won't judge!

state.text: Mmm, fair enough -- goodness knows I plan to skip the whole motherhood thing entirely, if I can help it. Fufu... Good thing that's not a concern between two women, isn't it? It's a perfect environment for safe experiments.

Yes, well -- fair point on the whole "child" thing; I didn't really think that through. Still, what's actuallywrong with creating a person artificially? Neither Shadow nor Omega were born, but they still turned out okay! {small}...Sort of.{!reset}

Now, there's a reasonable opinion if I ever heard one! Besides -- anyone who hoards fabulous wealth in their tomb is practically begging to be raided by bold, busty treasure hunters a few centuries down the line. Haunting trespassers is such an overreaction, no?
Mm, I'm sure you wouldn't... I'd offer to make your little solo act a double, but it seems you've found yourself a partner already.

Hmmm... Perhaps.
Though I expect such a stranger would need a quick wit -- and a very quick tongue -- if they're to keep up with yours! Now where could we find someone like that, I wonder...?

For the record, ~name~, my one true love is jewels. Stealing the poor target of your affections sounds like far more trouble than it's worth, so just point them out and I'll keep the flirting to a minimum.
Ever notice how whenever Sonic gets to know a princess, they tend to end up kissing? Blaze is an exception so far... but that doesn't mean I don't have a betting pool over how long it'll take.
Fufu... There's nothing quite like a bodysuit, is there? It covers so much, yet leaves so very little to the imagination.
Personally, I'm quite the advocate for catsuit couture. They can be surprisingly comfy, given the right textiles -- and yet they do so flatter the figure, too!
Ah, the catsuit -- a favorite of cat burglars and super spies everywhere. Honestly, what agent worth her weight in jewels would be caught out in the field without one?
I can't for the life of me fathom why Topaz refuses to ditch her old combat uniform. I mean, it's so drab and bulky -- who wouldn't prefer a nice, sleek catsuit like mine or ~name~'s?
Lingerie might be the more elegant undergarment, but I can still appreciate what a pair of spats does for a nice butt. Just like what my catsuit does for mine...!
I wonder if Big Blue's got a thing for spats...? He is the sporty type -- maybe athletic wear is what gets his engines purring.
Why, ~name~, what gorgeous green eyes you have. They're like a pair of glittering emeralds! ...Which, now that I say it aloud, probably sounds unsettling coming from a known jewel thief...
Why, ~name~, what dazzling blue eyes you have. They're like a pair of sparkling sapphires! ...Which, now that I say it aloud, probably sounds unsettling coming from a known jewel thief...
You know, ~name~... A friend of mine has striking red eyes much like yours. I know that some people might find them unnerving, but in my opinion, they're really quite handsome.
You know, ~name~, I just can't help but find such deep violet eyes to be incredibly charming... {small}even if I’d sometimes prefer not to. That darn echidna...{!reset}

case.state: Seriously...? Oh, please -- your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ even worth stealing.
Unless there's any hidden gadgets built into your ~clothing~, this'll be a pretty boring round...
Your ~clothing~...? Well, I suppose not every jackpot can be a big one.
Your ~clothing~, ~name~...? If I didn't know any better, I'd think you were stalling.
Ha... Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(look|looks)~ like something an old lady would wear!
Your ~clothing~...? Come on, ~name~, be a little bolder! You're not going to outshine me like that.
~clothing.ifPlural(They|It)~ might not be the most lavish ~clothing~ I've seen, but I suppose ~clothing.ifPlural(they have their|it has its)~ charms.
Haah... Is this what everyone was looking forward to when they signed up to play strip poker? Watching ~name~ take off ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ ~clothing~?
I think I've seen a rival treasure hunter wear ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~ like those|a ~clothing~ like that)~ before... Not that ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ was a very good treasure hunter.
Saving the really dazzling plays for later, mmm? Fair enough, I suppose.
Are you really counting ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ as a whole layer? Ha -- well, if you really think it'll help your chances, then be my guest.
Really? Just your ~clothing~? So stingy...
Oh, lovely, your ~clothing~... Glad to know I'm not wasting my time here.
Sorry, ~name~, but it's kind of hard to get excited about any ~clothing~ that ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ gem-encrusted.
So this is how you treat such a beautiful woman? Boring her with your ~clothing~...?
Really, is that what you’re going with? Stop fooling around and give us something really juicy.
I don't even have to look, do I...? I can already tell you're taking off something small and boring -- like your ~clothing~ or something.
Don't you think I deserve more than just your ~clothing~? Given how exposed I am, I'd think you'd have ample reason to be more charitable.
I'm starting to wish I was playing this game back home instead... Even silly little accessories have a lot more weight to them when the boys wear around three things at most.
~Clothing~...? Oh, you have got to be joking. Of all the silly wastes of time...!
Honestly, ~name~, just your ~clothing~ -- and when I'm "dressed" like this to boot? Why, I'm starting to think you're not all that into breasts.
No, no, ~name~ -- by all means, keep drawing out the game with useless little trinkets! It's not like some people have important plans for tonight.

state.text: Oh, please -- you're not about to steal my heart with something as insignificant as your ~clothing~.
{small}Just ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ ~clothing~...? I can probably leave this part out of my report.{!reset}
I hate to sound ungrateful, ~name~, but you’re not exactly giving me much to be dazzled by.
Come now, ~name~. Given the state I'm in, don't you want to impress me?
Aw, are you feeling modest, ~name~? ~clothing.ifPlural(Are|Is)~ your ~clothing~ all you feel comfortable taking off right now...? My heart bleeds for you, it really does.
Your ~clothing~, ~name~...? Glad you're making it clear exactly who's the bolder of the two of us.
Not even going to try and upstage my performance, huh...? Probably for the best -- I doubt you could outshine me anyway.
Come on, ~name~, where's your sense of ~target.ifMale(chivalry...?|fairness...?)~ I bet even ~target.ifMale(Knuckles|Blaze)~ would give me at least a little more to appreciate.
Hah... Hope you weren't planning to win any friends with a move like this, ~name~...
Haah... The game really is about quantity over quality, isn't it? No matter how cheap a garment is or how little it covers, a layer's a layer.
A stunningly beautiful woman right in front of you, positively drenched in her own juices, and you can only think to take off your ~clothing~? My, it's a real wonder you aren't more popular.

case.state: {small}I haven't seen the President lately...{!reset}
{small}Wonder if there are any jewels around here...?{!reset}
I suppose it had to come off at some point, but still, ~name~ -- can't you at least put a little more flair into taking off your ~clothing~? For me...?
Your ~clothing~...? I guess you're the type to pick the safe choice over the exciting one.
Mmmm, looks like we're starting to make a little progress...
How much did your ~clothing~ cost you, sweetie...? Surely, it was far less than I could easily afford.
{small}Now that I think about it... Hasn't the security in Eggman's bases been getting tighter lately? He must be preparing for something big...{!reset}
Your ~clothing~ may not be too exciting, ~name~, but I must admit -- ~clothing.ifPlural(they're|it's)~ at least more stylish than GUN's standard uniforms.
~clothing.ifPlural(Do those|Does that)~ ~clothing~ of yours have any hidden pockets, by any chance? Just curious.
...What are you looking at me for? If you want a clever quip, give me better material to work with.
{small}(Are you getting all this, Topaz? ~Name~'s taking off ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ ~clothing~... No, you're really not missing much at all.){!reset}

Feel like passing ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ over to me, ~name~? Don't worry, I'll give ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ back.
...Probably.

~clothing.ifPlural(~Clothing~ aren't|A ~clothing~ isn't)~ the best place to hide any treasure, is it?
Well... Maybe if it were something small...
Just your ~clothing~, ~name~? You sure you don't want to sweeten the pot a little...?
I bet you're starting to feel a lot warmer, aren't you, ~name~...? Doesn't it want to make you take off a bit more than just that?
Going with your ~clothing~, hmmm? Glad you're starting to feel at least a little bolder.
Smart choice, ~name~... Not very fun, mind you, but credit where credit is due.

I wouldn't say no to having ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~ like yours right now... Well, ideally ~clothing.ifPlural(some|one)~ a little nicer, but beggars can't be choosers, now can they?
I wonder where Omega is these days. Probably off destroying Eggman's creations as per usual, but still...
You probably feel smug you still had that, didn't you? Even after whittling my defenses down so far...
Oh? Just lovely... I don't suppose I could persuade you to make this round a two-for-one, could I?
Still playing it safe, are you...? Come now, ~name~ darling -- given the state that certain parties are in, this is exactly the time when you should show off more, too!

state.text: Come now, ~name~, just your ~clothing~...? If you're that reluctant to undress yourself, I'd be happy to lend a hand.
I spy with my little eye... nothing too exciting. C'mon, ~name~, throw me a bone here!
Oh...? And here I thought I'd sensed a glimmer of potential in this round -- but no. It looks like ~name~'s going to be an utter bore instead.
You're not going to excite anybody with your ~clothing~, ~name~... Well, not unless ~clothing.ifPlural(they were|it was)~ all you were wearing.
Showing just a little more skin this time around, ~name~? I didn't take you for a tease...
It's okay if you're feeling shy, ~name~... Based on what I've seen so far, I can form a pretty clear picture of the rest.
That's right, ~name~, take it slow. A good striptease is just that -- a tease.
Hah... Say what you want about Big Blue, but at least he's not the type to waste time on something so dull.
Mmngh, I really need to stretch my wings... I won't be missing much if I do that now, will I? It doesn't look like it.
~name~, this is exactly the time you want to be impressing me. I'll give you a hint -- you could stand to push the envelope a little more.

case.state: Honestly, ~name~, losing your ~clothing~ is hardly the most visually stimulating thing you could be doing right now! If you ask me, a gal in my position deserves a little more pizazz.
You have to take off your ~clothing~ already, ~name~? My, my... However did that happen?
Don't feel bad that you had to go this far, ~name~. Digging up what people want to hide is half of what I do.
It may be no jeweled necklace or diamond-studded tiara, but I suppose your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ an... adequate substitute.
Your ~clothing~ already, ~target.ifMale(handsome|sweetie)~...? My, my... How giving of you.
Taking off your ~clothing~ already, ~name~? Are you feeling a bit bolder... or have you just been backed into a corner?
Not that I'm complaining, ~target.ifMale(handsome|sugar)~, far from it, but have you really been giving it your all? Slipping past your defenses has been almost too easy.
I'm sure you'll look better without your ~clothing~, ~target.ifMale(handsome|sweetie)~... Really, we're doing you a favor, wouldn't you say?
My, my... Looks like this wasn't the kind of loss you can shrug off quite so easily, hmmm?
Down to your ~clothing~ already, ~name~? You're falling apart faster than a third-rate Badnik.
My, my... Looks like we're starting to uncover something a bit more interesting, aren't we?
Time to see just what you've been hiding under ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~...
Oh, I see that gleam in your eye, ~name~. You're not really all that sad to lose your ~clothing~, are you?
That's right, ~name~... Doesn't it feel good to get naked with such a pretty little bat? I bet this is what you were hoping for all along.
Giving us a taste of the good stuff, hmmmm...? Glad to see you're getting into the spirit of things.
I bet you thought you had it in the bag, didn't you...? Sorry you had to learn it the hard way, but just because I'm down a few layers doesn't mean you can take me for granted.
Is it any surprise that it came to this, ~name~? With such a stunning distraction across the table from you, it'd be hard for anyone to keep their eyes on the game.
Resorting to your ~clothing~ already, are you...? Glad to see I'm not the only one running out of options.
Do you expect me to feel sorry for you...? Forgive the lack of sympathy, darling, but just look at the state I'm in.

state.text: You think this is your chance to steal my heart, ~name~...? Looks like you're putting in a valiant effort, at least.
Just a reminder, ~name~, that I've got my eye on you... And I think I'm going to like what I'll see.
Mmmm, are you about to try and dazzle me? I I wouldn't say no to that...
Oh, sure, now you take off your ~clothing~... Not that I don't appreciate getting a little something more to ogle.
Oh my. Even if you're trying to cut your losses, ~name~... You're cutting quite a lot, aren't you?
Throwing me scraps, are you? Well, I'm not normally the type to rely on charity, but...
Ooh, finally a quality choice. Keep that up, ~name~, and I certainly won't complain...
My, my, ~name~... Are you looking to compensate me for my little display? Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ a start, but you've got a ways to catch up.
Mmmm... You couldn't have lost your ~clothing~ sooner, ~name~? Still, better late than never...
It wouldn't have come to this if you'd focused more on your cards, ~name~. Of course, that begs the question... Whatever could have stolen your attention?
My, such ~clothing.ifPlural(gorgeous|a gorgeous)~ ~clothing~...! I'm glad to see I'm not the only one here who knows how to properly accessorize.

~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(complement|complements)~ your outfit splendidly, ~name~... When it comes to fashion, you clearly have an eye for even the smallest detail.
I must say, ~name~, you have quite the eye for fashion. We really should go shopping together -- I'm sure we'd have a grand old time!
~name~, we really should go shopping together sometime. Your sense of fashion is simply superb -- and let me tell you, I do not impress easily.
The next time I'm in the mood for clothes shopping, ~name~, remind me to bring you along. It'd be my pleasure to have such a fashion-savvy companion!
Heh... This whole goth getup of yours is cute, darling. But it's a little hard to be impressed by it when one is friends with Mr. "Ow, the Edge" himself.
Well, Sucrose...? You heard the woman. Get kissing!

{small}Oh, for goodness sake... If I leave these two to their own devices, they'll just pussyfoot around any mutual attraction for months!
...Unless... Sucrose were to feel threatened by some competition, no?{!reset}
{small}Has Fluttershy noticed yet? ...No, clearly not. Well, if Sucrose has the guts to make her move, I'm looking forward to seeing just what her play will be.{!reset}

Oh? Well, in that case, perhaps I should put your skills to the test! I bet I could teach you a new trick or two -- and of course, I'd make sure you'd leave such a heavy petting session feeling no less satisfied.
Oh...? Well, if you're looking to sate your curiosity, I'd be happy to indulge you sometime -- though if I end up spoiling all smaller busts for you, don't say I didn't warn you.

case.state: Oh...? Well, if you're looking to sate your curiosity, it'd be my utmost pleasure to indulge you right now. C'mon, don't be shy, Shy darling...! What's a little fondling between friends?

state.text: Yes, well... As precious as that is, there must be something more in life that you're striving for! Surely that romantic's heart of yours is harboring some lofty goal or deep desire.
My, my... To hear you tell it, you've hit quite the jackpot! And here I thought black cats were all about the bad luck.
Fufu... You hear that, ~creepy~? This darling Princess might just give a ~target.ifMale(guy|girl)~ like you a chance.

My, my... Sounds like most folks should be a little more paranoid when it comes to hiding their deviant activities. Isn't that right, ~mast~? Imagine if you were being watched by a bat, for instance, while you were busy getting yourself off!
Nice try at saving face, Amy -- but we both know you made Dexter up. Still, I guess this is an improvement -- ~player~ might not be your actual paramour, but at least ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ exists!
Sure, Amy -- go ahead and do that. It must be so hard, finding ways to meet your "boyfriend"... considering that you made him up! Thank goodness ~player~, at least, is real, hmm?
Fufu... You hear that, ~player~? Well, if Miss Rose here gives her blessing, I see no reason why we can't engage in a little post-game intercourse.
Ugh. Twelve different innuendos just sprang to mind, and I hate every single one of them... On second thought, maybe it's better that those two don't get along.

An aspiring mommy, hmm? Whatever floats your boat, I guess. But I'll never get knocked up if I can help it -- between the bloating and the nausea and the pushing a whole baby out your vagina, the whole business sounds horrid from start to finish.

Motherhood, hmm...? To each their own -- but I'd kick in the teeth of any guy who got me pregnant. Nine whole months of soreness and nausea, then getting... painfully stretched out down there... Ugh, I shudder just thinking about it.
A family, hmm? Different strokes for different folks, I guess. As for me, there's no way I could be a good, proper mom -- even if I wanted to, I'd probably mess up the poor kid for life!
You, a stay-at-home mom...? Chase your bliss, I suppose. That said, could you picture me raising a child? Even if I tried my best, no way that kid's ending up a well-adjusted member of society.
Mmmm... Well, that's probably for the best. We don't need two Rouges running around -- the world just isn't ready for such dizzying glamour!
Mmmm... Well, that's probably for the best. When you're as dazzling as me, even the best copycats pale in comparison!
Hmmm... Good points all around, Amy! I suppose -- to put it another way -- {shadow}"You're not even good enough to be my fake."{!reset}

Relationship...? See, there's you're problem -- I suggest a little experiment and you start planning to move in together. There's nothing wrong with having some casual fun while you're still single, you know!
Relationship...? Amy, what did I just say about being so quick to commit!? A wise woman tests the waters before jumping straight into the deep end, you know!
Third person...? I don't know whether to be frustrated or impressed that you're so quick to commit, you'd sooner build a harem than try a one-night stand.

Third person? Amy, Amy, Amy... You're missing the point. If you really want to crown yourself Harem Queen, I am here for it -- but you should learn to at least taste the milk before buying the cow! ...Or bull, as the case may be.

Yes, well... As much as I understand the allure of the crème de la crème, I also know the importance of an exit strategy. I hope you've at least decided how long you're willing to chase a dream that may never come true...

Be as that may, even the best guy in the world isn't worth spending a lifetime chasing fruitlessly. You've already given ten years -- at what point do you finally draw a line in the sand and ask what you're willing to put up with?

In other words, you're not the type of gal who could ever be satisfied by only second-best?
...Fufu. Well, I can't say I disapprove.

In other words... Why settle for silver when you can go for gold?
...Fufu. That's the sort of thinking I can respect.

Fufu... My, so professional! Here's my palm for you to read, madame...
...Now tell me, what future lies in wait for me?

My, Amy, what a splendid idea! Glad you thought of it all on your own...
...Also, I just so happen to know of an island where a pirate king's treasure trove is hidden. If we'll be at the beach anyway, might as well look into it, no?

Mmmm, that sounds simply dreamy. Of course, no reason why we can't indulge in a nice, long soak once our little game here has concluded... Perhaps we could even persuade our fine tablemates to join us, hmm?

Pool party, hmm...? Well, far be it from me to turn down an excuse to go swimsuit shopping!
...Unless, of course, you'd prefer it if we engaged in a little skinny-dipping instead...

Ah, I remember it so clearly. The two of us pressed together beneath a single showerhead, naked and wet, spreading soap suds allllll over each other's supple curves... is the sort of scene ~player~'s picturing right now, isn't it?
Oh, I agree, Amy dear... But isn't that what we're already here to do? Kick back, relax and -- if we find somebody we hit it off with -- take a load or two?

W-well, you see... We only fooled around a few times, and we knew from the start that it wouldn't turn into anything more. So I didn't think you'd need to know, let alone want to... I must say, you're taking this shockingly well.

Hardly the sort of thing you could sustain long-term, then -- but still, to think you'd have it in you to even consider a secret tryst like that...! Amy, darling, you're more devious than I give you credit for.
Is that so...? Why, then, it'd be a crime if I didn't give Vanilla a little nudge in your direction. Hmm... Now, what would be nice and subtle, but still effective...?
"On the job training"...? Good thing Vanilla didn't hear you call it that -- you might have been thinking strictly of marital arts, but you make her sound like a common streetwalker.

"On the job training"...? Sure, she's got experience, but Vanilla's a stay-at-home mother, not a call girl.
...Though if you're looking to break into the business, I could always refer you to a reputable agency...

By "on the job training," I'll assume you meant strictly marital arts... Otherwise, Vanilla might resent the implication. Still, you couldn't find a better mentor -- her "Would you like dinner? A bath? Or me?" is a work of art.

Amy... If you truly believe Sonic's the type to fool around without permission, or to break up with you as soon as he gets bored, then you shouldn't pursue him in the first place. Go find a guy who'll actually treat you right!
